title: SHEIN-Shopping Online
description:
SHEIN Big Savings x Black Friday
Gear up for great deals with Black Friday bargains.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is a fun and ultra-affordable online shopping platform. From fashion apparel to home, beauty, accessories, shoes and pet, plus electronics, tools, office and more,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life. We'll keep you in the loop with push notifications about new drops and more. You can also engage with other SHEIN lovers and in real time. With free shippings and free returns policy, hope you have a pleasant journey with SHEIN!

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save more
- Get an extra 30% off on your first order 
- Free shipping & free returns (*conditions apply)
- Daily Flash Sales: Score up to 90% off for countless items

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
URL: us.shein.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/sheinus/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/shein_us/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s): 

	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

‚Äª Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions. 

‚Äª For smartphones with Android OS versions below 6.0, individual consent for each permission is not possible, so all permissions may be applied as mandatory permissions. If you upgrade your smartphone's OS to Android 6.0 or higher and reinstall the SHEIN app, you will be able to set access permissions for each item individually.

scraped_reviews.content: I add an item to my cart, then when I select it to do final checkout - the price increases. Sometimes doubling. That is so shady. I don't want to be shown an "Estimated price", when it isn't even anywhere NEAR that price when I actually try to buy it. I enjoy shopping on Shein, but I've noticed this for a while now and it makes it confusing and honestly makes you not want to even look at stuff. I'm not the only one that has noticed this, either. Multiple other people have noticed it as well.

scraped_reviews.content: My first order was great. I ordered 4 items (2 clothing) and they were all great quality. This last time I ordered, all three clothing items were cheaply made (though they cost more), itchy, and awful. Also, I don't like their return policy. The first item of each order is free to return but after that, each item has a $7 fee. Not worth it if the item is $10 or lower.

title: B612 AI Photo&Video Editor
description:
B612 is the all-in-one camera & photo/video editing app. We offer various free features and tools to make every moment more special.
Meet trendy effects, filters, and stickers that are updated every day!

=== Main features ===

*Create your own filters*
- Create a one-of-a-kind filter and share it with friends
- No problem even if it's your first time creating a filter. Filters are easily completed with just a few touches.
- Meet the creative and diverse filters of B612 creators.


*Smarter CAMERA*
Apply real-time filters and beauty to capture every moment as your pic of the day.

- Don't miss out on daily updated AR effects and seasonal exclusive trendy filters
- Smart Beauty: Get a perfect recommendation for your face shape and create your custom beauty style
- AR Makeup: Create a natural look from daily to trendy makeup. You can adjust beauty and makeup to suit you.
- Shoot clearly anytime, anywhere with high-resolution mode and night mode.
- Capture the fun moment with the Gif Bounce feature. Create it as a gif and share it with your friends to double the fun!
- From video shooting to post-editing with over 500 kinds of music. Turn your daily life into a music video.
- You can use a custom sound source for music by extracting a sound source from your video.


*ALL-IN-ONE PRO editing feature*
Enjoy basic, professional-grade tools.

- Various Filters & Effects: From retro to emotional modern style! Create the atmosphere you want.
- Advanced Color Edit: Experience precise color edit with tools such as professional curves, split tone, and HSL that brings out details.
- More natural portrait edit: Complete your pic of the day with beauty effects, body edit, and hair color styling.
- Edit Videos: Anyone can edit videos easily with trendy effects and various music.
- Borders and Crop: Simply adjust the size and ratio and upload it to social media.
- Decoration Stickers & Texts: Decorate your photos with various stickers and texts! You can also make custom stickers and use them.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! It has great fun filters and effects plus tons of stickers, and a great selection of filters and photo editing tools. It's also 99% free and doesn't pester you to pay for it. I would give five stars except for the fact that once you save a picture, the app closes. I'd like to be able to save and keep working on a photo. Also I'd like to be able to go back in and keep editing things like text, stickers, etc once I've confirmed the edits, but I'm not sure if that's possible.

I really like the new "portrait" background blur effect the app has. The quality of the pictures isn't as good as my normal camera app though. I wish there was a quick way I could send photos from Google Photos to the B612 app for editing as that would be a lot more efficient for me. I also wish there was an easier way to "undo" slight edits similar to Snapseed.

It would give people way more choices and variety to app. Over all it is a really good app that allows you to make very cute videos. For example maybe collab with Pandora, Apple music, and other music apps. I just feel like this would make it even better! Thats why I decided I would give it a three star instead of four.

Because as soon as you get into what you're recording, the video turns off. and there's no way to adjust the time duration to make it longer.. Instead of flopping the view of the photo that you take.. & it allows you to adjust a lot of other things too. I just wish it would allow longer videos. 20 seconds is not enough

First they started charging for most of the filters and features. Now they want to limit me to 3 very short vids pee day. I guess they think I'll pay, but in reality I'll probably go find a new app.

This was one of my, if not, my favorite editing app BEFORE the updates. All my saved stickers and filters are gone and the new remaining ones need Internet to activate, are a few and you need to switch from category to category like for million of times to find something that will please you. Fix it. Bring back the old version. I regret I updated the app. Honestly.

title: Merge Dragons!

Take part in brand new themes every two weeks with a cool puzzle for you to complete - can you match and collect the brand new dragons, too? MERGE DRAGONS! descriptionHTML:
Our Terms of Service are changing. See https://zynga.support/T2TOSUpdate for more info.

Discover a magical land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and more powerful items for your journey.

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING - dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Encounter and solve challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

Match even more with daily quests and rewards with Kala. Take part in brand new themes every two weeks with a cool puzzle for you to complete - can you match and collect the brand new dragons, too?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects üçè ==
‚Ä¢ Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with through 81 challenges!
‚Ä¢ Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
‚Ä¢ Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
‚Ä¢ Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level‚Äôs cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds üê£ ==
‚Ä¢ Discover 37 brand new dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
‚Ä¢ Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles üß© ==
‚Ä¢ Almost 900 quests to challenge your mind!
‚Ä¢ Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 180 levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
‚Ä¢ Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more! How many combinations can you make from 1600+ objects that come before you?
‚Ä¢ Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?

== Camp Building üè† ==
‚Ä¢ The evil fog has taken ahold of the main camp, fight off the fog and heal the land to restore and take back the dragons‚Äô home!
‚Ä¢ Collect dragons eggs, hatch them in the main camp, and earn dragon power to fight off the evil fog.

== Be Social üë≠ ==
‚Ä¢ Add your friends and gain inspiration from them by visiting their camps and learning their strategies. Gift items and rewards - sharing is caring!
‚Ä¢ Unlock the Dens feature to join a Den, and play alongside like-minded defenders of Dragonia! Socialize, chat, share tips and tricks, and help out fellow members of your Den - band together to heal the land!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Follow us on our social media accounts for latest updates:
Facebook
Instagram
Twitter

Optimized for Tablets. May be played without an Internet connection.

Merge Dragons! is FREE to download and includes optional in-game purchases (including random items). Information about drop rates for random item purchases can be found in-game. If you wish to disable in-game purchases, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.

Use of this application is governed by Zynga‚Äôs Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
summary: Tap to merge! Unlock new dragons, decorate your camp, adventure awaits!

scraped_reviews.content: Increasingly unplayable over time. Once this was a fun and engaging game. Over time new features have become intrusive to the point that you can't experience immersion due to constant interruption. Upon open I usually have to close 11 different in-game pop-ups before being able to start play. Then other pop-ups interrupt play. It's s o bad I am stepping away from what was once a daily play game for me. The tragedy is that this is a very functional game ruined by choice.

This is a fun game, very addictive. BUT be warned, once you advance in your camp to a certain degree it will glitch. I just merged 5 rare items that I have saved up for months. After giving me the reward of multiple dragons, rare items I had not seen yet, and an upgrade, the game went white and kicked me out. Logged back in my rewards were gone, 4 of my 5 items that I had just merged were replaced as if they were never moved but missing the fifth so I cannot simply re-merge. Months of work gone

Look, I've been playing this game for several years, and it's just getting downright disappointing now. No more camp and chill events and clearly you disregarded any suggestions I messaged you about making things affordable to buy (way too expensive), expanding the home area for more room, and being able to disable the dragons harvesting in the camp as they quickly clutter free space. Time to find a better game

In the middle.. Okay, I start off with the good points. It's easy to play, has some challenges as you progress.options on the ads and does not focus on it. Different events when you get to that level. Cons, no way to earn dragon gems without purchasing them. Eats up space at camp site because of that. Goals are also blocked as well. Either not enough energy or points to do things in game. Would like for if the developer can make more of balance In the game in regards to dragon gems.

This is addiction at its finest. Just a suggestion to the administrators, it would be nice to have more ways to win dragon gems instead of having to purchase them all the time. Some of us don't have money. Ijs Edit: After playing more I noticed that this game is very glitchy. Things disappear and reappear at times, especially when I get enough items to merge which can be very frustrating. Another suggestion I have is making a search in camp to find items when overcrowded an a undo button.

Fun & NO ads! I've been playing for several years and I am totally addicted to playing! While it's an easy game to play there is also strategy involved. It has puzzle aspects (World Map) as well as the merging. There are different areas to play, and you can participate in all, none or any quantity in between! You can play without spending real money or pay for extras if you want to advance more quickly. If you join an active Den, or play events you can earn free eggs and dragons every week!

Disappointed. I upgraded my phone and lost ALL my progress including a few purchases I made. Customer service is great and gave me a bunch of gems for the inconvenience but they are not able to restore any of the progress. Definitely was not going to start again in every single world and challenge. Lost all the dragons I had gained. Your progress is not being backed up even though you select cloud backup and have a green check mark. Game has been deleted.

I've been playing for more than 2 years. The game is 8 years old. The developers just removed the ability to re-roll decision eggs. What's the point of even having them if they can't be re-rolled? I'm sitting on several that have NOTHING I want, so buying the Season Pass or using gems for the Dragon Shrine chests is now a ginormous waste of money/gems. I'll just be emptying out my bubbles until they restore this FEATURE.

I love the game, but when I try to take an item out of the storage box thing, if I already have another of that item on the grid, it just deletes that item. At first, I didn't really think much of it because I thought it was a one time kind of glitch, but I just got a special chest from the current event and wanted to merge it, so now I'm pretty frustrated. also, this is meant to be me reporting a problem because the game doesn't actually have a report problems thing to use. EDIT: fixed, I think

Most rewards, chests and dragons are collected by spending gems at the end of each level which are almost impossible to get a hold of, and you'd need a crazy amount of them to do anything. If you complete a level, you should automatically get the reward, not have to pay for it. And, no, a penny and a flower for free are really not rewards, since you can make those every minute in camp. You could buy gems with real world money of course. I just don't see how this can be fun

Haven't played in a week, haven't missed it... I've been playing this game for YEARS, but the recent changes have made me completely stop playing. The "tier" system for rewards is just plain greedy and stupid. The only reason why I played the shiny events was for a chance at the mega nest, now that's a tier 2 prize. They got rid of camp and chill, which was easy and fun, the longer events are so boring and repetitive, and there are way too many other mini "quests" to keep track.

When I first started playing this game in 2017/2018, I loved it. I play every day. The first issue is if you don't have money to buy stuff, don't play. If you are like me and your points are at 2 billion and dragon power at 1.4 million points, your camp is impossible to manage, overcrowded, land is ridiculously expensive, as is egg storage space and there is no way to earn gems on a regular basis. So, if you have money to burn, this is your game, if not, keep looking. Do better developers!

Started off loving the game but now not so much. The events started as fun but now are just bothersome because there is not enough time to complete it, especially w/o buying the expensive gems. Most of the land takes 5000 to heal which is just ridiculous. I can do 5, maybe 6, of the tasks but I have to leave the game running ALL day and night, or use gems which again are too expensive. Locked spots can't be unlocked because the items are not there or reachable. It's just not fun, nor relaxing

Used to be fun, but it is too difficult to communicate with CS. They say they will pass messages, but I have yet to have my Martian Chronicles board fixed. The game board is so cluttered with garbage and pop ups that accidental gem purchases are inevitable. I don't even bother asking for their help. If the devs would spend more time expanding the games they have (Arcadia is a great example) and releasing the Sea dragon so we aren't stuck in Arcadia, the game would be fun again. Alas, not to be.

5 years later: I deleted the game, probably not long after writing the original review. Not much has changed. Still expensive. Dragons still focus on skulls etc in events if allowed 0.3 seconds to themselves. I don't really understand the guilds but otherwise, it's pretty good. Not quite enough chalices to do regular levels but then, if you play the levels to gather resources, they regenerate fast enough.

Good at first, now unplayable. I've been playing for years. Started simple, nice art fun to play for a while. Now its popup after popup. You have to close out 6 screens every day just to get the game open. I deleted for this reason. Redownloaded and found even MORE popups. It's like once a week they add something new that you have to keep track of and close and they aren't realizing its stacking and annoying.

I genuinely enjoy the game and really hope more levels will be coming soon. However, I' been having a lot of issues with ads recently. There have been some ads for rewards that play, but then the ad won't have an X on the ad to leave it well after the ad is complete. some of these game app ads wont even let me back out of the ad with my phone's back button. I have to completely close the game and go back in, but then I dont receive what I watched it for. Just a little frustrating.

The app crashes at least twice every single time I try to play. Every time it crashes, I lose specialty items in my camp and progress on world map levels. Customer "support" is worthless because they always pretend they can't do anything to compensate the losses. They're lying, of course, which just makes them that much more worthless. I was going to buy one of the big gem bundles, but now I've changed my mind. I'm DONE with this unreliable cash-grabbing excuse for a game.

I've played for awhile and while I like some of the new additions its getting repetitive to the point of boring. There's never any new levels and the mystic challenges are always the same ones over and over again. Maybe less of trying to add so many new additions and add more levels more often and also why does the max level only go to 50??? I made that in no time and now its just stalled.

With the latest event, Brinefall Isle, I am so disappointed. I really enjoyed having a different scenario. I finished the game early with 2 days left, only to find that I couldn't get the last cloud key without paying 690 gems for the most expensive capsule. With some research, I found that different players had different capsule keys, so some players get to "win the event," and some don't. Was this someone's idea to make more money? Thanks for deceiving and betraying your loyal players!

Loved this game for years, but a new challenge requires you to spend a fairly large amount of gems to finish the secondary goal of clearing the board (called healing land). Gems are collected in normal play but in small amounts. I have chosen to spend a decent amount of money to buy gems, but being "forced" to use them REALLY turns me off this game. For in-game challenges, I put a lot of time into clearing all goals. I find it the most satisfying part of the game, but this ruined it this week.

Pay to Play. Unless you buy their in game currency, this is super slow moving. It takes to long to gain activity points to play the main game. And everything from coin to iron is hard to gain. Most everything is purchased with the "cash" currency- purple gems. Most of the treasure boxes you find need those to open them. Rather frustrating as I'm finding most of my time is spent waiting around for my gold or iron to accumulate enough for me to build something. Dragons sleep most of the time.

Game was fun for a very short amount of time. I played a lot when I was younger but deleted the app and couldn't remember anything about my save file so I just restarted. I remember there would be an event then it would end and you would have to wait about 2 days for the next one. Now it's constant sometimes multiple events all the time. It's definitely become pay to win. plus recently the app has been crashing and won't save the last few minutes of play time. Considering uninstalling.

*Edit* Developers are making changes that are requiring more money/gems in order to play. Doesn't appear that they listen to long-time players. Glitches are more frequent. soon will become a 1 star rating if things do not improve. Sad really was a great game! Awesome game, a few glitches. Would love for the dragons to be awake longer!

I've been playing this game for a while now and I do love it but after a while it gets very annoying and frustrating when I'm trying to move things around and the dragons automatically rummage everything and put them in random places and they get in the way a lot. I understand that's the whole point of the game but I wish there was an option to turn off automatic rummaging, instant 5/5 if there were.

they take away getting free things for ads if you pay for literally anything btw, if you like playing this game do not ever spend any money on it or it'll get 100x harder. you could've had all my ad revenue, was playing for hours every day and watching tons of ads, but if you're gonna be this greedy I'm gone. I'll give it a few days but if I don't get them back soon I'm never playing this stupid game again.

Giving one star because I can't give negative stars. This isn't fun anymore. No strategy, just a tedious grind fest with ever-rising costs, and anything that makes gameplay less grindy/expensive will be changed to put another obstacle in front of the player. Increasingly convinced that the devs don't care about the player experience. Look elsewhere for merge games

The back to back events have grown tiresome. additionally, you have made bingo impossible to complete; mine has consistently required accessing Dragonia Kingdom (which sucks, btw) for card 3, but I am unable to travel there for the exact timeline of the event. I've traditionally paid for season passes and other add-ons, but your haphazard development is leading me to abandon your game. it's just gotten too sloppy. it's a shame, because I have loved playing for years.

The game was ALOT of fun at first but the more progress you make, the more storage it takes up and lags and resets CONSTANTLY!!! Super frustrating, I used to love playing but now, when you try to open it, it wont even load or open after this last "update" which is even more frustrating because I just bought the 30 day gems and will be missing out on those also, so wasted time AND money. Really not cool..please fix this ASAP..yes I constantly clear the cache (daily) in my phone.

literally the funnest game I've ever played! I love that I don't have to wait for certain things like other games out there. other than dragons to sleep and even then there's other things to do while that's going on. I could play forever if I really wanted to lol. No, but seriously there's always something else do. It's very rewarding and very fun 10/10 recommend! finally a good game! Other games I've lost interest in because I have to wait so long for things to load or etc. I love this game!

A nice game overall. Events are frequent but can be exhausting as they last three days, and you have to be playing near constantly to get all the prizes. I'm not sure what I think of the newest event. So far, I don't have a high opinion of it because there aren't enough resources to get all the prizes, at least without spending tons of gems. I've healed all the land and uncovered every mystic cloud except one. I'm sure it holds more resources, but I can't unlock it without a special chest.

I've been playing this game on and off since 2020. I'm on an older Samsung tablet. the game keeps freezing. Mostly freezing at camp after few actions, but occasionally within levels too. My progress in levels stays with completed levels at least, but my camp keeps starting over. I've spent coins and gems on dragon eggs. The game will freeze and I'll restart. Eggs purchased are gone but the coins or gems are still spent. This is my favorite merge game and I'm super upset. Please Help

game is awesome and everything looks cool. I've had it for years, but once you get so many dragons it becomes hard to manage things while all your dragons keep harvesting stuff. the area gets filled with stuff and you can't do or get anything because you don't have space. I would suggest one thing; that there be an option to force all dragons to go to sleep. I haven't played in a while because of this and I want to play it. 3 stars because it's been two years and still no way to stop dragons

I have been playing this game for years and its just progressively getting worse. if you dont pay to play it's ungodly hard to progress in the game. Gems are so hard to come by but every other time I log in im down to 1 gem, with out spending any. I can't seem to get in contact with tech support to try and fix any problems im experiencing. every update seems to bring more and more problems. I dont want to stop playing but I am not having any fun anymore. üôÉ

I loved the game and it was great, until it started closing and taking my eggs, coins and chests away. I've spent a lot of money, until now. I just purchased $30 gems & app closed. I lost the money AND didn't get the gems. After contacting support, I was told they'd look into it. It's been a week with nothing. I'm being ghosted now. I'm done and going to uninstall and file a complaint.

I clicked on the reward as usually do and it refreshed and went in a circle didn't give me the reward over and over again it's timed so every day get one I didnt want to miss the daily reward so I uninstalled and reinstalled the game when I signed in my game was earlier lot lower level I lost a lot of progress and I spent lots of money and lots of time to get to that level also the rewards I claimed all 5 days now it shows that I missed all 5 of them but the last one.

I love this game, this is my first time ever leaving a rating on anything. I usually don't rate games or anything buy I adore this game! it's the only game I'd ever spend money on too. I don't regret it one bit! the things you buy with dragon gems, or chests you unlock are the opposite of underwhelming. I have all the first 3 premium islands, and it took me a good hour to sort out everything you get! the payout is great, and it's only about 15. not to mention, the dragon designs are so cute! :)

I hope you NEVER need "customer support ". Support they are not. I love this game and have been playing for 8+ years. When something went terribly wrong and caused a loss of almost everything, they were helpful. When I found out the totality of my losses, they accused me of it being MY fault and did not help accordingly. It took 3-4 days for a response and even then were ultimately unhelpful. I now have to start over so much of the work that I put into this game. This has been going on a month +

In special games stop making it impossible to progress without spending so much $! I enjoy the game but on ever special game u spend gems or $ because it's the only way to progress. A game regardless is meant to fun. On the event games by level 3 ur going to lose Everytime because what u need isn't available in the game! I'm getting tired of feeling cheated!

While this game has potential to be good, they ruined it by shoving in a bunch of nonsense aimed at getting whales addicted to it so they spend hundreds of dollars. either you will get frustrated when it shoves walls in your face or you are weak and will be addicted and go bankrupt. either way can't really recommend. Also eventually you just run out of space and there is no satisfying or functional way to store and organize everything, which just kills your motivation to keep playing.

Okay, I played this game several years ago, it was a relaxing time passer so I decided to come back. Since it has lost all joy, events that used to be mostly on holidays are coming every 3-5 days. The events are timed and laid out in such a matter to make them a horrible grind to accomplish. I strongly suggest you stay away from this game it is not relaxing and is in fact the opposite, it is a frustrating game with no real sense of accomplishment.

I'd suggest that you'd be able to reset a level without needing to spend chalices. It's fine an all but it's kind of a pay to play game as in to get any progress you need to buy things with real cash. I've spent wayy to much money on this game. The "Dragon Chalices" (their currency to play levels) are honestly a joke with how many you need to use for each level. Being only able to play one level then need to wait 3 hours to play the game again it's not really a good way to keep people playing üòÖ

This game is really fun. While it takes some time to progress, I still find it really enjoyable. It's definitely one of my favorite games. I do have 1 suggestion though. When we complete a challenge or level and it starts to heal the rest of the land or add things to it, it'd be nice if there was a skip button so we don't have to sit and wait for it to finish, that way we can continue with playing the game instead of wasting time.

Just knocked my 5 stars down to 3. The concept of watching videos for bonus rewards is great but watching ads just to have them freeze on my screen or not getting the reward after wasting time watching the ad is frustrating as hell and really takes away from the enjoyment of the game. Each and every time have to do a forced stop to get the game to function right again.

I found this game through Mistplay, and I love it. It's addicting. I do wish things didn't cost so much. I am experiencing a glitch where items like coins, stone, etc.. (basically items you tap on to collect) disappear, but the tap button shows up. The square appears empty but the item isn't there. The only fix is to force close the game. It is kind of annoying and messes with me.

A very fun, very addictive game I've played for over 5 years now, starting over with each new device. I'm on my longest stretch yet with a 300 day streak, and I love it. It is a bit buggy with the saving, as you have to exit out to the world map before closing the game or you lose some progress, and it's getting a bit overwhelming in camp with all of the mini games on one screen. But it's still my favorite mobile game, and I highly recommend it.

The game itself is wonderful and fun. I love the concept. However it's so annoying that gems are so hard to get ahold of unless you want to buy them. Also there should be an undo button. My main complaint though is when I play a timed challenge and all of the sudden the game lags when I merge something or heal something. It's not my phone, or internet or wifi (etc).It doesn't just happen on timed challenges but it is so frustrating when it does. Fix it please, I almost deleted because of this.

Love game, but hate the glitches. I played this game for almost 2 years. I got a new phone and lost all my progress. I reinstalled, now the game freezes and I have to either toggle the switch for moving around the camp, or exit then re-enter the game. I'm getting really frustrated. update active game play is frozen for about 15-25 seconds when first opened and after certain other parts of the game is visited, like the dragon breeding, the missions and Arcadia

It's a good game! I love it, the issue is that you can't do much besides sit in the camp. In the beginning, your Dragons are ALWAYS sleeping. There's not much to do.... and it takes hours to get enough whatever you call it to play a new level..... the economy of the game is fantastic, you can spend money but dont need tto I will give you a 5 start upon doing something about the hours of downtime ... too much down time, and I start playing another game...... and might stop playing this one..

I returned to the game after a few years of not playing and it seemed even better once I started playing again. One of the things I didn't like previously was how much gems were needed - the special jars for extra stuff, egg chests, event chests, etc. However, it seemed that new updates introduced watching ads for a lot of these things. I will never mind watching an ad for a little prize instead of spending money and ads aren't pushed on you unless you choose to watch them. Very addictive game!

title: Moto Camera 3
description:
Requirements - Moto Camera 3 is only compatible with select devices launched in 2020 and beyond.
Redesigned for reachability and one hand usage, Moto Camera 3 is packed with amazing features to capture the perfect moment, each and every time.
Features:
Quick Capture - Never miss a moment. Launch the camera with a simple twist of your wrist, then twist again to switch cameras.
Portrait - Add a nice background blur to your photos. Also, adjust your blur level or change to black and white in Google Photos.
Pro mode - Put yourself in complete control of focus, white balance, shutter speed, ISO, and exposure.
Spot Color - Select one color while everything else becomes black and white.
Google Lens - Use Lens to search what you see, scan text and translate, and interact with the world.
Google Photos - Select the thumbnail for sharing, editing, and backup in Google Photos.
And much more!
descriptionHTML:
Requirements - Moto Camera 3 is only compatible with select devices launched in 2020 and beyond.
Redesigned for reachability and one hand usage, Moto Camera 3 is packed with amazing features to capture the perfect moment, each and every time.
Features:
Quick Capture - Never miss a moment. Launch the camera with a simple twist of your wrist, then twist again to switch cameras.
Portrait - Add a nice background blur to your photos. Also, adjust your blur level or change to black and white in Google Photos.
Pro mode - Put yourself in complete control of focus, white balance, shutter speed, ISO, and exposure.
Spot Color - Select one color while everything else becomes black and white.
Google Lens - Use Lens to search what you see, scan text and translate, and interact with the world.
Google Photos - Select the thumbnail for sharing, editing, and backup in Google Photos.
And much more!
summary: Fast, simple, stunning photo and video capture.

scraped_reviews.content: Please stop automatically editing my photos when I have automatic editing turned off!! Edit: I take a picture, I immediately go to look at the picture, I see the picture as I took it, and then it processes and the colors have shifted, some things have blurred, etc. I KNOW other people have complained about this for years based on my searches. I will not be reaching out more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley, sorry, we're not following what you mean by automatically editing your photos. Can you please reach out to us at camera@motorola.com with any examples that you feel were automatically edited? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Like others have mentioned, it auto-edits my photos without prompting. This should never have been an automatic feature, it should always be user-prompted. And for the last three months, the app crashes almost every time I open it. Sometimes it freezes for several seconds before I can use it, and sometimes I can take one picture and THEN it crashes. Very annoying if I'm trying to catch something on the spur of the moment.

When I take pictures, more so in dim lighting, my photos are automatically edited. On my last Motorola I was able to turn off "shot optimization" and that fixed it, but in this version there is zero option to turn it off. Add back the option to turn off the auto editing and all the reviews expressing this dislike will be resolved. It's not that hard to add a setting option, especially when it's been done with previous models.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Micha, can you please send us example dim lighting photos that you feel were automatically edited to camera@motorola.com? We'd like to take a look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: The app crashes when attempting to take photos of shipping labels in photo mode. I must use portrait mode to take photos of shipping labels instead. I only notice this happening maybe for the last couple of months or so perhaps, but not exactly sure as to when since time flies by so fast nowadays. If this is supposed to work, then please fix it. Thanks.

This camera app is so slow and buggy, I would actually recommend you buy a different brand of cell phone. And I've had many Moto phones. This camera app has been misbehaving for years. What happens is that every third time or so, the app locks up upon opening. Or it freezes for 15-20 seconds after the first photo. You press the shutter and you hear a click 15 seconds later. Or it freezes for 15-20 seconds when switching from photo to video. I've missed many moments!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi H, can you please send us a screen record video of this issue to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: It could be better. I keep running into places where the camera adjusts the light temperature (and balances out the white levels) on the photos I take. I don't want that. There's a reason I want to take a photo of the beige bits in the shadow when there is well-lit pure white nearby: That's where the drywall is still wet! It also messes with the visibility of the multicolor glitter on wrapping paper. Any advice on how to make it stop doing that would be appreciated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sean, we recommend that you consider using the Pro mode for this purpose. You can manually set the white balance so that it doesn't change it on you. Hope that helps.

scraped_reviews.content: Pictures look great, but sometimes just disappear. I've lost some really special ones that I know were there and then *poof* are gone a moment later. Sometimes the camera just won't take pictures. And sometimes it's just a blurry screen. It's making it impossible to capture candids. Definitely a shame, as I make the choice for this phone because of the camera. (I've cleared cache, surfed the web for answers, and tried to find updates.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jen, really sorry to hear about this. Is it possible for you to take a screen record video of when you see this happen and send it to camera@motorola.com? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Extremely annoying to have every photo I take be automatically adjusted. Especially when it blurs or softens what I have tried to focus on. If I want filtered or adjusted photos I would do it myself. I can literally watch the photo change after I take the pic if I immediately switch over to the photo from the camera. I will be looking for a different camera app and uninstalling this trash. Edit: I'm not sending you photos, developer. Use the app and you'll see for yourself what I am saying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry about this. Can you please send us example screenshots before the photo is adjusted and corresponding captured photos to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: If anyone is suddenly having a problem with a black screen when they launch the camera app here is how I fixed mine. After reading other reviews I learned that you have to allow the camera access to location. I could take pics with other apps like Facebook but not the actual camera. After turning on location(which I don't like) my camera works again. Hope this helps!!! If this could be fixed I woukd change my rating.

Must Save Copy?!?! Randomly forces me to Save Copy when I choose "Enhance" so I have to either have two copies of the same photo or I have to delete the original photo after I "enhance" it, which means I lose the ability to revert back to the original photo. this is THE most FRUSTRATING thing I have ever experienced and it doesn't happen all the time. how can this be a random issue? and it looks like it's been a problem for a long time but still no fix? WHY?? It's TORTURE!!!

Outaded, hasn't updated in years. The app constantly crashes and operates very slowly. When I finally get to take a picture, the app has about a 60% chance to simply not process the capture, resulting in no photo saved. It will show up in the mini window as if it did take the picture, but something will happen during processing which stops it from actually compiling / saving the photo. When taking video, the app slows to a crawl, and I get about 1-2 fps, sometimes freezing for seconds at a time.

My camera worked great before there was an update. I accepted the update, assuming there was some security patch or something, but now it's really hard to focus. Most of my pictures are very blurry, and the barcode reader can't read the barcodes in the supermarket. The camera also runs much slower, so slow that sometimes it doesn't take the photo when I press the button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nathaniel, sorry to hear about this. Can you please send us screen record videos and example photos of some of these issues to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: Worst camera I've ever had. Gets blurry and I can't get it to stop. The color isn't good I thought I'd have a nice high-def beautiful color camera with my new phone and that's not the case. Pictures or too faded and light I can't get them to be darker and rich with color. They're faded into bright and too light. I like to take photos off the TV and share them on Facebook. My old Motorola can do that this one can't. The photos just come out blue. I love doing that so now I'm very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sheli, sorry to hear about this. Can you please send us example comparison photos of these issues to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: Stop auto smoothing, adjusting colors, etc, to all of my photos I take. Auto enhance and facial filters are completely disabled, but unless I use the cameras in 'pro' mode, when i click on a photo after ive taken it, i can see the original for a moment before it processes and removes stretch marks and smooths blemishes and adjusts colors. If I wanted my photos edited, I'd do it myself! This is a ridiculous thing to be forced on, even when all settings remotely related are disabled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear about this. Is there a way you could send us example comparison photos from the normal and pro modes so that we can see what you're experiencing to camera@motorola.com? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: (EDIT: Camera app is still crashing after the July 18 app update.) Great until the new system update. Maybe a few days to a week after I updated my phone, my camera's processing was stuck on for a little while, and now all of a sudden it crashes every time I try to open it. I've only had this phone since January! I already restarted it, force stopped the app, and cleared the cache. Still keeps crashing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Willow, please try doing a "Clear storage" on your app data by pressing and holding the Moto Camera 3 app icon and selecting the "i" icon. This does not affect your stored photos or videos.

scraped_reviews.content: Trying to get the camera to switch from front to back is a miserable experience due to the time it takes - when it happens at all. Trying to text a picture that I just took doesn't happen because my picture is often not found for hours or a day or not at all. I gave the app a 2 because when it does take pictures I can see, they are good pictures. Sure wish they'd fix the problems, though.

I have to clear out my app cache every time I want to use it in order to get the highest MP/resolution, otherwise it always it's on 8MP and I can only choose 6MP instead until I clear the cache. (I have seen others here and on Amazon reviews have the same problem.) After each photo I take, there is a few seconds of delay before I can take another, which is incredibly frustrating and I can miss a shot. It can also freeze up my phone after leaving the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Myranda, the maximum resolution is controlled by the aspect ratio that you select. The camera sensor hardware is 3:4 aspect ratio. If you change this to 9:16, the resolution will be reduced from 8MP to 6MP because the camera sensor hardware gets cropped. Please try returning the default back to 3:4 to see if that helps. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: the app itself is fine. the image processing software is the issue, images look great when you take them, then click on the image and wait for it to process when it's finished you get a blurry over saturated too much contrast mess of a photo. I found it actually takes better photos if you take stills while capturing video, because the image doesn't go through the same processing. The app and device definitely don't live up to the advertised quality.

This camera app is the default that came with phone and it constantly crashes, takes a long time to load, freezes my phone and can't ever focus to take photos or scan barcodes. I'm constantly having to restart phone after using and my pictures don't save. I have to press the button so many times and I definitely can't use to capture anything spur of the moment it's so slow. It's up to date and so is phone system. Very frustrating because I only have my phone for pictures.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachelle, sorry to hear about this. Can you please send us a screen record video of this issue to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: My first review got deleted after sending the screenshot they requested. It was getting worse, losing most pictures, taking multiple presses to start video recording. Original: Loses pictures on my Stylus 2021, even after reviewing them to make sure they took. Sometimes, says processing, other times not. When I go to photos, not there, also no longer in camera app when I go back. Pics I took yesterday that I thought were gone showed up in photos today. Maddening. I need a good photo app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Keith, can you please send us a screen record of this issue to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: I have had trouble with it having a latent shutter which is caused some sputtering of the image, also when I resize the photos they do not load well into my other applications, I believe there may be some problems in the software, perhaps it is unstable. I'm trying to find the exactly what is the issue, it has something to do with size, and pixel density. Also, there is no resizing abilities in this program which I need when transferring into the internet, bummer, things could be smoother

When I open the app or sometimes when I'm using it, it crashes and freezes my whole phone. My phone is a new Moto 5G Stylus that I haven't even had for a year yet. There is also an issue when you take photos, they look clear and crisp, but then they get "processed" into looking soft and blurry. I don't know what's going on, but please fix this ASAP. Social media already ruins quality of android photography, I don't need my actual phone camera doing that too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, can you please send us an example screenshots of the clear photos and corresponding "processed" photos to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: All video modes can never focus no matter what I do. It won't focus at all, zoomed in or out it's always blurry along with pro style and panoramic camera. Also I click the shutter button and it takes about 3 seconds for it to shutter and take the actual picture. Finally, when I open the app it takes 5 to 10 seconds to fully open where it'll let me take a picture so if I need to take a picture in a hurry I don't even bother.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin, can you please send us example videos and screen record videos of these issues to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: After reading several reviews, I am not the only one experienceing this issue. I didn't even ask for an updated version my phone did it on its own. But everytime afterwards I want to take a picture it just disappear. Now I need to edit a photo and it's gone all together. It stopped working and it's preinstalled in my phone. I can't get to edit photos or take pictures üòî It was a 5 ‚≠ê until it stopped working. What is going on? I'm in the middle of a court case. I need to edit photos.üßê

The pictures taken with this camera tend to turn out very nice. I love taking pictures for fun and I always got clear pictures. A few months ago it stopped working. When I open the camera I get a message saying "rear camera hardware is not working, switching to front" and it shows for less than a second and crashes. If I open it a second time, I get a notification saying "Camera keeps stopping". For some odd reason, the camera works on apps that use it but the rear camera is in black and white.

Blurs every picture you take. I rely on my 8 year old Samsung Galaxy to make sure I get great, clear photos. Don't know what I'd do if I wasn't able to find that phone. This camera wouldn't be so bad except it automatically adjusts the image quality for you that ultimately ruins the whole thing. I don't know who designed this camera, but they should be fired.

Y'all I shouldn't even rate this as a camera app. Half the time when I click the shutter button is says "capture failed try again" on top of that the exact frame I try to snap never takes, instead when it "loads" the picture changes. I don't know why there are updates because it doesn't fix anything, this camera is garbage and doesn't focus on anything and won't let me take a decent picture without using AI. This is THE WORST CAMERA APP. Negative 20 stars. I'm tired of it

Big fan of the camera on my Motorola edge 2021 however the recent update has locked me out of recording videos. It'll open the camera and work just fine (sometimes when I take a picture it won't save it for some reason) and when I swipe to the video option it says that some other app is using video resources and that I need to close that app and try again. I've tried after a fresh restart, I've cleared the cache and done everything else to no avail. Really disappointed.

I am facing several issues with the camera app on my device. Please look into the following points: 1. When I tap on the video option, the recording starts after 3‚Äì5 seconds, which makes it difficult to capture quick moments. 2. The portrait mode has no zoom option and no background effects available. 3. The focus speed is very slow, and sometimes it does not focus correctly even in good lighting conditions.

Simplified so much to address user complaints, that they overshot by removing any control over image resolution other than selecting "standard" or "high" for a given aspect ratio. I needed to take a low filesize photo to submit to city services, and had no ability to do so from within the app. There's not even an option to access resolution from Pro mode. Big step back. (Also, Google's Photos app lacks resize functionality, so who did you think you were offloading this to?)

When I take photos with the Motorola Edge 50 camera in normal mode, the pictures are automatically edited even though all the AI camera settings are turned off. For example, I take a photo where the subject‚Äôs eyes are open, but after a few seconds, the photo is delivered to me with the eyes closed.‚Äù ‚ÄúBecause of this issue, I always have to use the Pro mode, which is very time-consuming. Also, even in Pro mode, when I adjust the shutter speed to a low-light setting, the photo taken is darker tha

The most frustrating condition with the camera app is that it often hangs while clicking a photo. Sometimes, it takes long time for processing a photo after clicking. I cannot take photo of any digital display like TV, Laptop, Desktop. Camera automatically hangs when there are more than 1 source of light. When will these problems be resolved??? It's really frustrating###

Sometimes, but quite often, it takes a photo or a video, there's sound click, there's visual effect of taking photo, the new photo appears in the miniature window on the bottom right side... But no photo file is being created. The photo is not actually being taken. Sometimes its being processed longer than usual, but often there's no file in the end.

Dear Moto company gentlemen, I contacted you several times regarding a problem with my Moto G84 device because of the camera. When I run Snap to take a picture or run the regular camera, a picture or video at a high resolution of 1 or 1.5, the camera freezes and lines or a black screen appears and it takes me out of the program, noting that if I put it at a size of 0.5, whether video or pictures, it works perfectly only when it is zoomed or the mode is at the highest level, the camera program fr

Is is almost ok, but has one major issue which makes me now switch to a different camera app. There is an image post processing step that can not be turned off. This processing can destroy images in multiple ways by making them blurry, switching to a different frame where people have got their eyes closed instead of open, make the image too dark. You get to see the good picture first and then you're just hoping that the processing won't do much with it. Extremely annoying.

The images looks crisp and sharp in view finder, but after capturing the images, they are becoming much softer, probably due to the excessive processing the camera app is doing. And being a professional photographer, I liked the grainy but crisp images that I used to get from my moto one power. It feels like all the extra megapixels and hardware is not being utilised well. Hoping with updates moto will be able to work it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sabyasachi, can you please send us example screenshots from the viewfinder and corresponding captured photos to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: They got rid of my previous camera, so I got this one. It had noticable flaws, one big one being it's bad at focusing. My images aren't always very clear. Now they've gotten rid of this camera too. No notification or warning, or an email with "hey this app isn't compatible with your device, use ___ app instead."

Total game changer and not in a good way. I've had Lenovo or Motorola phones for years, but the camera is now so awful and unreliable I'm looking at switching entirely. The app lags, it crashes randomly, you can take photos and then find it hasn't processed them. Forget relying on this if your photos are important to you - or if you see something in the moment and want to snap it quickly. It gets 2 stars because the pictures it does take are mostly ok. Very disappointing.

Please stop automatically editing my photos when I have automatic editing turned off!! Edit: I take a picture, I immediately go to look at the picture, I see the picture as I took it, and then it processes and the colors have shifted, some things have blurred, etc. I KNOW other people have complained about this for years based on my searches. I will not be reaching out more.

Just got an Edge 40 and the camera was initially very disappointing but after the latest update it seems to have gotten better. Clarity seems to be pretty good and the noise levels are quite normal. A lot of the colours are boosted and this can generally be described as "good looking" especially in outdoor HDR scenarios. However, in indoor situations with warmer lighting, the white balance is completely off and all the pictures end up looking extremely yellowish. Very inconsistent performance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sreshta, thank you for the feedback. We definitely want to take a look at this indoor situation issue. Would you be able to send us example photos of the specific scenes you are experiencing this in to camera@motorola.com? Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The camera performance is extremely disappointing. It doesn't support recording videos in 60fps with the wide-angle lens; instead, it defaults to 30fps, resulting in poor clarity. Even with the normal 1x mode, the claimed 60fps feels more like 30fps. This app is not worth the price, especially for 30k.. Additionally, the so-called 'bug fixes and improvements' in updates don't seem to make any noticeable difference, leaving me unsure of what's actually improved.

when I click a photo. It is not stored .it keeps showing processing and then just vanishes from photos. This is happening for last 3 months. I am not able to store any photo. All clicks are sheer waste because they are nowhere in gallary. Even the processing has become extremely slow. Clicks have lags. Camera is now pain. Help me out . Resolve this issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shardul, sorry to hear about your issues capturing your photos. Can you please send us example screen record videos of this issue to camera@motorola.com? We would like to better understand where in the capture process the photos are disappearing. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: unreliable, will crash after recording 30 minutes to 120 mins of video losing all your footages. have lost hours of videos due to unreliable app crashing with camera is processing notification. never finishes losing the video footage. Need to a force quite camera or reboot phone to fix. other times will record 180 minutes without issues. Swiping up in horizontal mode while recording seems to cause it to fail. hitting stop will complete the save in a few seconds. Be careful using this app!!

Terrible pre installed camera app. 1) It crashes when you point at QR codes 2) When shooting a video it keeps refocusing which causes video to wierdly flicker all the time. I had the whole phone camera changed by authorized service and it didn't go away, so it's not a hardware issue. 3) Once you take a photo, it "enhances" the quality of the photo, making it blurry and ruining a pretty good photo, which you can see for about half a second before this happens.

My third Motorola phone and what a disappointment. I cannot do burst shots on my Edge 30. (Photo mode) Essential feature for me as I take a lot of pictures of moving animals. I have tried and tried and it just doesn't work. Removed screen protector to see if that was the issue but no. Usually you just keep your finger on the screen or shutter button but nada! Old phone was more responsive. So much for a super duper Oled screen! Waste of money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Heather, sorry for the delay. We've been trying to reproduce this issue internally but haven't had any success so far. Can you please send us a screenshot of your screen from where you're trying to do a burst so that it can help us root cause it to camera@motorola.com? This will help us see which options are enabled. Thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using it on Edge 30 and I am not happy with the experience. A number of times the app hangs and the photo clicked is not saved. The app crashes at random moments, especially when recording videos. Many times the recorded video has glitches (at regular intervals). It's sad I have to use other camera apps on my moto device just because moto can't figure out what will work on their own device. Other apps might not give me better picture/ video quality but at least I know won't crash!

I hate this camera app. Whatever the photos or videos that we are taking are either added with lot of noise, when we zoom in laptop or device it looks blurry or something like oil painted. There's no original feel in the picture that we took. I don't understand it's a problem with the camera app or this device itself. This makes me think of changing to other mobile.

On my trip to the US in September/24 I took dozens of photos. Initially they were visible in the Photos app. Then I can't see any of them anymore. They all appear in gray and unavailable. They weren't exported and I can't open them. They appear with a *.hdr.jpg extension. I tried to open them with other apps like Photoshop and I can't access them. Did I lose all the photos???

Just bought moto edge 50 pro a few days ago. Camera has a lot of problems. Out of nowhere it just gets shutdown after taking 2/3 photos . Takes too much time to be processed! & Oh my God it just gets too hot if you take multiple photos at a time. Horrible experience!! Additionally, video quality is too bad. Over sharpness, skin tone all are just a disaster!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shagor, can you please send us example too bad quality videos to camera@motorola.com?

scraped_reviews.content: Easy enough to use but jpg compression is way too harsh. What is the point of putting a 50 MP camera and then compressing the life of out the photos? It needs an option to enable the amount of compression to be set to give very high, high, standard, low quality. I've tried to find this in settings. Been trying Open Camera which has this option for the standard camera and produces much better images, but this won't access the various lenses (macro, 50MP). Please add an option for this.

title: Photoroom AI Photo Editor
description:
Create pro images that sell with Photoroom AI.

Photoroom‚Äôs AI technology makes it easy to design, edit, erase, and replace any background from your photos. Create professional-quality images that elevate your brand, boost engagement, and drive sales.

Why choose Photoroom?

AI-POWERED DESIGN
No design experience needed! Simply describe your idea, and Photoroom AI quickly creates backgrounds, social assets, scenes, logos and more. Save time while the AI creates professional designs for you in seconds.

REMOVE AND REPLACE BACKGROUNDS
Enhance your product photos effortlessly with AI backgrounds. Use the smart eraser to clean up details or quickly erase distractions. Create polished product shots, eye-catching posts, or ad-ready images using the fastest technology.

ENHANCED PHOTO EDITING
Photoroom‚Äôs AI photo editor helps you erase unwanted objects, clean up images, and improve photos with ease. Adjust lighting, shadows, and sharpness for professional results while keeping the background exactly how you want it.

TRANSFORM IMAGES INSTANTLY
Showcase clothing on lifelike virtual models, place items in stunning staged scenes, and instantly enhance visuals with the Product Beautifier. Photoroom‚Äôs AI makes it effortless to create polished, professional images that elevate your brand.

BUILD YOUR OWN BRAND KIT
Keep your logos, colors, and fonts all in one place for a consistent design every time.

SAVE TIME WITH BATCH EDITING
Edit multiple images at once, perfect for e-commerce sellers or content creators. Quickly replace a background, erase imperfections, and apply your chosen design style across every photo.

CREATE IMAGES FOR EVERY PLATFORM
Ensure your images are optimized for Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Amazon, Depop, Vinted, Shopify, and more‚Äîwithout cropping or pixelation.

CUSTOMIZE TEMPLATES FOR ANY OCCASION
Choose from a variety of AI-powered templates for promotions and events. Customize templates to match your needs, saving time on design while creating standout content.

COLLABORATE WITH EASE
Invite team members to Photoroom to collaborate on designs in real time. Photoroom‚Äôs AI-powered tools make sharing, commenting, and editing seamless, ensuring consistent branding and efficient teamwork.

Who can benefit from Photoroom?
„ÉªE-commerce sellers: Create product listings with AI-powered background removal and editing, and showcase clothing on virtual models. Use batch editing to erase flaws and apply consistent designs.
„ÉªContent creators: Design standout images to grow your brand. Change the background or use the eraser for perfect shots.
„ÉªSocial media managers: Produce engaging posts across platforms. Erase or replace backgrounds for Instagram, YouTube, and more.
„ÉªFreelancers: Deliver professional designs to clients on time. Erase mistakes, refine the background, and batch edit at scale.
„ÉªEveryone: Whether it‚Äôs a logo, product photo, sticker, or social media image, Photoroom‚Äôs AI tools help you design, erase, and perfect every image.


Why millions love Photoroom
‚≠ê Easy to use: With Photoroom‚Äôs intuitive AI tools, anyone can create professional visuals‚Äîno design skills required.
‚≠ê Pro-level results: Achieve high-quality results effortlessly, thanks to Photoroom‚Äôs AI photo editor and background remover.

Upgrade your account 
Unlock advanced tools, premium templates and extended limits on exports with Pro and Max plans. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled in Google Play settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends.

Whether you‚Äôre growing your online store, building your social media presence, or designing content, Photoroom‚Äôs AI-powered tools make it easy to create, erase, and transform any background into a stunning design. 

Join over 300 million users today!

Terms of use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/
