summary: Design with AI: Remove backgrounds, edit photos, retouch images, create logos.

scraped_reviews.content: ETA updated app. Now, the free version is useless. No backgrounds. Can't even resize your photos. Photoshop is better than this. When I tried the pro free trial, which I planned on doing the subscription, it wasn't much better. Not to mention, trial was supposed to be until 03/10, & charged AFTER that, but they charged on 03/09 - luckily I authorize all charges on that card and was able to decline. I canceled my subscription due to that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the background options and the unexpected charge. It's disappointing to hear that your experience didn't meet your expectations. Your concerns are important to us, and we value your input as we work to enhance our service. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us.

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this app initially. Lots of options. I originally got it for the background eraser, which did better than others, but the AI generator was nice and used that frequently too. Now, you are severely limited with the background generator. Even for simple, plain background that only include shadow. It's absurd, for $90 a year. My plan also isn't even registering as PRO, it's giving me "Max" benefits, while paying for Pro. Very frustrating and hard to find where to get help.

I have been waiting DAYS FOR SUPPORT to respond! I paid for a sub. There's a serious glitch with the app that will not allow me to select images once they're applied to my template. I can't select or edit, it's happening with EVERY template. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE! this isn't my issue but an app issue. I'm going to cancel my subscription today if I don't receive a response.

1. This app does basically nothing without first giving them a credit card. The "free trial" automatically starts billing you after a week. And 6 bucks a week??? You'd have to be pretty stupid to pay that! 2. On the first photo I tried to edit, it "helpfully" erased the background without asking. The background was the whole point of the picture! I just wanted to resize the photo!!! UN-INSTALLED in record time!

The only reason I used this app was because it was free. Constantly crashes, constantly updates moving things around, doesn't properly remove backgrounds. But I dealt with it because it was free. Now you want to charge $5.99/weekly (311.98/year) for an app that is worth a fraction of that, nah thanks. There's too many other apps that work just as good if not better that are cheaper. And yes there's a $90/year option, but you have to pay it in full. No way im giving $90 to an app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you so much for your feedback! We completely understand and we're sorry for any inconvenience. To clarify, with a subscription you get access to the whole array of tools available, not just background removal. This article can tell you more : https://help.photoroom.com/en/articles/11495331-introduction-to-ai-tools-in-photoroom

scraped_reviews.content: This app WAS great until a day ago. I subscribed, it was fantastic and now it sucks! i have a necklace business. I could put it on a display, photograph it andcremove the display so that I just have the necklace, which I could create all kinds of great backgrounds. Software update yesterday and now I cannot remove the display that the necklace is on. useless to me now. will cancel my monthly subscription. Glad I didn't pay for a yearly.

this app used to great!!! I use it every day for work. now it has a "limited download" after a certain amount of photos downloaded, that they don't tell you, you can't download your pictures to send to clients. I pay for the pro version and shouldn't be having this problem. I refuse to "upgrade" to the max version. it's a waste of money and will be cancelling my subscription. do better
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for sharing your feedback. We‚Äôre very sorry for the frustration caused by the export limits. We‚Äôve listened to our community and have since lifted those limits. If you‚Äôre still experiencing any issues, please reach out through the in-app support so we can assist directly.

scraped_reviews.content: it ALWAYS cuts short on me when I'm halfway thru a design and I think that's absolutely annoying bc I have to start over. but I figured out I could save my designs when I think it's getting closer to that cut off point. the only problem, I don't know exactly when that is because it's usually every 10 or 15 minutes. so now I have a BUNCH of halfway done designs saved into my phone. but it's better to start again from the half done design then starting over all the way from the beginning

Easy to use. let's one edit photos to every detail including the lighting on the subject and not the whole image. which is crucial when you're dealing with AI backgrounds. I tried other apps but either they require extra credit purchase AFTER you have already paid for a subscription or it doesn't have all the features that this app has! I am definitely renewing my subscription. Keep up the good work!

Why is there a sneaky "free" upgrade to Max without providing the terms first? I clicked to see the terms and was upgraded at the same time as being provided the terms with no opt-out! Then to downgrade you might lose your current pro pricing because you have to cancel and then renew. Are a bunch of people going to be charged an exorbitant amount in 6 months when their free trial for Max ends since there's no opt-out? I hate this and it's such a waste of my time when I was just trying to login!

Good app, sometimes difficult to manuever as it sometimes doesn't flow and once you tap a pic to see it better you can't go back to see the other previously generated versions. You will have to generate another. This adds up as you have a limit. Conflicting pricing also. In some areas it says $14 or $15 a month, other links (all via app, google play, etc...) say $5.99 a week. I tried monthly, even when clicking a link, and there is no other option but weekly or yearly. Good app...too expensive.

Been a paid Pro plan user for my small business since 2023. loved the app. Upgraded to the Max plan. The app keeps closing. Want to go back to Proplan, but I have to cancel the subscription, wait for it to run out, and re-subscribe to Pro. I don't have time to wait for it to run out! why you cannot just switch back to pro plan is beyond me. you have lost my business as I need an app that works NOW not days from now when my subscription runs out for your Max plan that keeps shutting down.

Used to be great but not anymore. It's super glitchy and the batch option doesn't even work properly. After your photos are uploaded with a background, the object in the photo disappears. Then you have to go in and do each one individually. I paid for the pro version thinking it would help with all the issues, but it doesn't. And no refunds! What a waste.

So I have to say, I do really love this app and what it offers but there's definitely room for improvement. I think my 1st, and biggest issue that I'd like to see remedied, is the fact that there's no way to upload your own photo and mess around with it in Ai. 2nd thing that bothers me and seems to be the norm nowadays for some reason, it's marketed as "create any image you can imagine" but has censorship on A LOT of stuff. If I'm paying, I want to be unrestricted!!

Fantastic app! Has more photo editing features than I could ever possibly think of and then some. And they are quite generous with the options allowed for use without paying for it... which made me purchase a subscription all the more. Great marketing technique! Completely convinced me to buy the pro version which is reasonably priced in comparison to other apps. I highly recommend this app to anyone who likes photo editing. I promise, you won't be disappointed. Amazing job app creators. üëç‚ù§Ô∏èüì∏

I used this app's paid membership for 3+ years and there was a noticable decline in the speed of the batch function when "max" (a more expensive subscription) started to be offered. I now see that increasing batch speed is a feature of max. Stop making your app worse and then asking us to pay more to fix it. Needless to say, I no longer use the app.

New version is not as good. üòî I've had this app for about a year and been happy with it for $90/year. Now the results aren't as good and they have a new tier which costs $250/yr. They are getting greedy!! They have slowed down the $90/yr plan and no longer show you 4 options. You have to keep hitting the button for more options. Feels like a bait and switch since I've already had this app. I can get photoshop for $10/mo. There are lots of other AI apps, why would I pay so much more?

I was using the PRO app for a year. However, it still has some problems and needs some better updates. First of all, Ai does not understand what I want and keeps making the background its own. Second, this app doesn't have color control and size reduction. So, I have to take a photo to another app to fix the color and the size of the photo. Third, I can't attach my own logo to the picture or can't write my own words. When I attach my logo to the picture, it does not let me

I've used this app exclusively for my business for over 5 years. today I go to edit my photos which consists of, crop, auto contrast, darken. 3 clicks, only to find you get 3 "free" saves per day. I have thousands of images and now you want me to pay to subscribe? you've already got ads running.... thanks for the memories. bye

very nice app, love the background eraser feature and it's accuracy. I love the multiple backgrounds in the app and filters, however I have 2 problems. one is that you have to pay for features I feel that should be free. For example, the ai shadow feature may not always be accurate. So that should be free. And there are so many pro options, when I just want to use the app without a membership. That's my two cents but super convenient to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback on the background eraser and filters! It‚Äôs great to hear you find the app convenient. We recognize your thoughts on the pricing of certain features and understand your desire for more free options. Your input is valuable, and we‚Äôre here to listen!

scraped_reviews.content: I use the free app, which is fine! you get a LOT of options without subscribing to the "Pro" option. HOWEVER, the ONLY complaint I have is when removing the background of an image you don't have a way to select what the background is, app assumes it's everything except the main object, which is not always the case. For example, I was attempting to edit a picture of my cat, Phoebe, laying on the couch, when I selected "remove background" it removed the entire area around her, including the couch!

This app is literally one of the best photo editing apps I've ever used! I pay for pro, I use it faithfully and often. 9/10 times I have no complaints. The one thing that happens that really gets to me tho is when editing a batch, particularly a larger one, occasionally everything will reset in the middle of doing something and my progress on all pictures has been lost. I've lost literal hours to this happening. If there's any solution I'd greatly appreciate it!

I love the app once I figured out how to download to my photos. The only reason I am giving it a four is it would be nice instead of getting an error & wasting time searching how to fix it, or just stop downloading it would give me an idea of the problem. Like "you have exceeded your monthly free downloads, to see your monthly list go to"... before you begin it tells you to update. Other than that it's the most affordable and user friendly one out their. Hope it remains that way.

I pay for the pro level but can't even get through the login for desktop without a bug preventing me from logging in. The desktop site was already buggy before the new login process, but I don't want to pay for yet another service just to remove a background. Also, file sizes are smaller than the original image. The android app still seems to work fine. (Edit: Never mind. They've added even more AI "features" recently that just clutter up the whole UI)

I need to first say I've been very (vocally) loyal to this app as being the best thumbnail maker out there, and I was literally a week away from buying the upgraded version. Then... surprise! ... you took away our fonts! That was one of your best assets--i.e., the ability to use a HUGE library of fonts. Now we're stuck with about 10 standard ones. That is so disappointing Idk what I'll use instead but am definitely removing this app. I don't understand why you did this, PhotoRoom.

It says it's "#3 top free in photography." But only the most basic features are free. Everything that is free in the app comes standard on phones nowadays. I guess it's good if you're willing to pay and need it. I was just looking for something fun. Also, all the 5* reviews are obviously not actual users. A very sketchy way to get people to download.

This last update fixed a crucial bug, and I appreciate that. But I really liked the 'studio' quality backgrounds. They were awesome! Please bring them back! Another thing I miss, is when you duplicate or edit a cutout, it used to snap the pic back into place. Having to try and place it directly onto the pic isn't easy sometimes. Anyhow, I hope to see more improved updates in the future so I can continue to give more stars! ü§û

This really pissed me off. There's so many functions and options to utilize to make some neat photos, but most EVERYTHING is locked for pro. I kept going round and round trying to erase parts of a photo and put some back in it, and it kept messing up, erasing most of the person and having to start all over! Maddening. Plus, like I said, VERY few ways to make a fun photo. Everything locked up. Pfft. Not cool. I test a TON of photo editing apps and it's too bad greed got in the way of a good app.

So this app has some really cool features, easy to use, and produces a great final product. That being said, ran into some creepy issues. At one point when I clicked regenerate background on a wooden surface I liked, I never got it back. I changed to a whole new background of like almost the edge of a desk with a white text box on it that looked like it had latin written in it. I proceded to click regenerate 2 more times and only the text inside the white box would change. Took screenshots.

Worked great for two years, and I am paying for a pro plan. Unfortunately in the past few days when I try to edit a template or add a photo, I received an error that simply says "an error occured". Will look for an alternative app and will cancel my subscription if they can't fix the issues. It's basically useless now. Edit: the app is still buggy, and none of my templates work. I'm cancelling my membership and looking elsewhere. They introduced AI and it ruined a good app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback, and sorry for the inconvenience. Could you contact the support team directly inside the PhotoRoom app? (you just have to click on the Help icon in the top bar). It will help us investigate and fix the issue (feel free to ask to talk to an Android developer directly). Thank you in advance! üôè

scraped_reviews.content: Loving this app. Makes taking pictures for my business more of a breeze, compared to my old way of finding a white background big enough for the item. With this app you just take the picture and it removes the background for you. and they toss in a wide variety of color choices for the background. you can also add text and overlay other images. Try it out. They offer a 7 day free trial. which i singed up for right away.

New Review: This is a great app. Not only one of the most accurate background removal tools I have used, but certainly the fastest. It's become a necessity for my eBay business. The annual cost for Pro is worth the price. To make this a 5 star review, there is one glitch that needs to be fixed and one element that needs to be changed. The glitch is that every other time I try to do a multiple photo background remove, after the first image is scanned, it reverts to the previous batch of photos that I selected. I need to go back, re-select the images, and start again. Nothing dire, but an annoyance. Even more helpful than fixing that glitch would be to change the way the edited photos are named when saved. My phone's photos are named with a timestamp. The Photoroom saved photos append "Photoroom" to the FRONT of the name which means when I download and sort all my pictures, the Photoroom pictures are separated from their originals because it's sorted alphabetically by name. If "Photoroom" was added to the END of the original file name, I would be able to see the original and the edited pictures side by side. I photograph products for eBay and have hundreds of pictures at a time. When I go to organize and upload my photos, it would be great if all the pictures of the product (both original and edited) were all side by side and grouped together. Instead, I have one grouping of the originals and then way down at the bottom are the edited pictures. It makes organizing more difficult. If "Photoroom" was simply appended to the END of the original name, they would all be grouped together naturally. I hope that makes sense. Former Review: I need some tech support. I'm a paid subscriber using a Samsung Galaxy S10E. The app has been glitching the past couple of days, but suddenly today it is completely non functional. Every time I select a picture, it starts the "scan" and then says "an error occurred". I have removed and reinstalled it and I have restarted my phone. Nothing works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your feedback. We are sorry you had that experience with us. We had a little issue with one of our servers for about 2 hours on that day. We apologies for it. It is all fixed now. Feel free to contact us from inside the app if you are facing an issue so we can help you with it

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app for dropping backgrounds! I manipulate a lot of graphics for work, so I have at least 5 softwares for doing so. This app drops backgrounds faster and better than all of them; even those that cost thousands of dollars! It's "smart" and detects what type of "thing" the focal point is (I.e.-dog, table, plant, etc.) and offers numerous types of backgrounds. Whether you want it transparent, novelty, or for marketing needs, there are plenty of options. The free version is great, too.

It's a magical application, and I highly recommend it; but I'm just a hobbiest. As it stands I have to use 3 to 4 apps to get the desired results I want. If one of them provided me with everything I needed fine... They don't though, but they all want to reach into my wallet for a monthly fee. Make a one time buy option that just gets rid of the watermark. Then have a subscription for people who want additional frames and features. I miss the days you could just, you know.... Buy something.

Wow, this app is pretty amazing. I haven't explored all of it but what I have used is quite impressive. Changing the background in your photo is simple to use and tons of options to choose from. I am not a techie person, but wanted my photos to look more pro for listings online. This app is more than I expected it to be. ü•Ç Cheers to the brain behind the scenes!!

Used the trial once, hated the app and apparently didn't cancel so they billed me for a full year. I can't log in to dispute charges so will be seeking refund from bank. 0/10 avoid. Edit: The automated response isn't helpful. The issue is that the app subscription is predatory and with 2 clicks you can sign yourself up for a $100 yearly membership for something that literally NO ONE is trying to sign up for. Thanks for nothing. Still wouldn't recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear about your experience with the trial and the billing issues. It's understandable to feel upset. Your feedback is important to us, and we appreciate you sharing your concerns. If you have any further details, please reach out through the app so we can assist you better.

scraped_reviews.content: Best app if you want to remove a background instantly. Does the solid black and white backgrounds too and with one push of a button. Any color!!! It also integrates with Google photos! So, when you are looking at your pics and click 'edit' a menu now comes up asking if you want to edit with Photoroom or whatever. it's so easy too. Don't have to learn a thing. Thankful for this app!

The recent update to Version 3 has not met our expectations at all! The new design elements, including the cartoonish and bland backgrounds, lack the professional appearance of Version 2. Unfortunately, there is no option for cancellation or refund for the remaining balance of the prescription. Had I known about this significant downgrade, I wouldn't have made the purchase.

It removes the background, they have mediocre backgrounds to use . Even though you can keep generating 4 more, they all still look the same as the 4 previously. They are out of their minds to think it is worth $5.00 per weekPlus, I couldn't even get it to save my creation.. 2 stars cause it does actually cutout the images nicely. Definitely nothing different about this app than the million others, other than the others will save the design, not just have a save button. Plus, others are free!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback, and sorry for the inconvenience. Could you contact the support team directly inside the PhotoRoom app and describe your issue? It will help us investigate and fix the issue (also, feel free to ask to talk to an Android developer directly). Thank you in advance! üôè

scraped_reviews.content: The background remover function is excellent. But so are other apps for a better price. Bummed that recent updates did away with all of the color and preset backgrounds, leaving only the AI-generated options. They are good sometimes but lately have been mostly disappointing. The photo editor is not good enough to be listed as a feature. Now I'm debating whether or not it's worth what I pay and I'm again in the market for an app that does what yours used to. Bummer.

The app was great until the latest update. I was so happy with the results I purchased a year subscription. Unfortunately that has now changed. The AI takes forever to regenerate backgrounds now if it completes them at all. When choosing a background for a selected photo it stalls and only loads about three-quarters of the way and just stops. Also, there getting rid of v2 and replacing it with v3 which can't get solid color backgrounds right ( ask for black get blue, etc). Time for a new app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your detailed feedback and understand your disappointment with the recent update. It‚Äôs concerning to hear about the slow regeneration and background issues you‚Äôre facing. We value your input, and it will be instrumental in our efforts to enhance your experience. Thank you for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: Before the latest update I gave it 5 stars. It was totally worth the money considering what you'd pay for a photographer. But it just went really down hill and I'd say 90% of the backgrounds don't look good anymore. The lay-outs, backgrounds and placement of my objects look ridiculous. It was looking great with my pottery, now most is floating in the air and in awkward positions.

Garbage. Terrible. Do not install. Edit: not confused. Just sells ur data. Lots of ads, tries to make you buy stuff. Could not do what I downloaded it for, just had a very long intro where it tries to steal your data and make you buy stuff, then automatically removed the background. So like it can do a few things, but is not worth the hassle. Then they flagged my review lmao I just wanted to edit on sunglasses. That was not possible. I did not test other features as the app was frustrating
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! It seems like your review is unclear. If you‚Äôre facing issues or have specific feedback, please use the support options in the app to share more details. We‚Äôre here to listen and help!

scraped_reviews.content: While the monthly price is steep, it is worth it, especially if you have a business. I was skeptical because there are ads constantly revolving around me, but this app is impressive. To remove backgrounds, I would have to upload to PC and cycle through about 3 different apps that could do it properly, and each of them took forever to deliver. Photoroom removed 90% of my backgrounds in 5 seconds or less, and adding templates is effortless. We haven't even delved into further settings. Try it!

I‚Äôve used PhotoRoom for a few years as a small reseller, and until a recent update, it was great. They previously removed the watermark for loyal customers, which I appreciated. However, the latest update limits you to 250 photos per month, which feels too restrictive for small resellers like me. The watermark is also more intrusive unless I upgrade to the $90/year plan. Since I only use the white background feature, I‚Äôll likely switch to other tools if this change isn‚Äôt reconsidered.

Lots of errors when you subscribe. Also, In order for it to scan your photo, you have to be connected to the internet. Which means everytime you take a shot or upload a photo, this may or already sent also to the developers. Which means it may be collecting your information including the Referrer API which tells them when you open, hit a button, and closed the app..

Geared toward companies that have to post pictures of things to sell, yet there a lot of free apps that do what this does and even better. I tried 2 different photos, one of an object, one of a person and it showed me a preview of what my photo would look like without the background, just like ANY other FREE app, I would have had to manually edit the photo anyway. But then it tells you have to pay and kicks you back to choose photo. their ad templates, were a joke. Not representing my company.

Way too expensive.... I can't really do anything without the in-app purchases, for the price of this app you can get the full Adobe sweet witch includes lightroom, Photoshop and illustrator.... I am a photographer but I often use my phone for product images for my small jewelry business I was hoping to use the AI backgrounds, they work pretty well but it's not worth the price...... what have been totally worth the price if it was a one-time purchase of $7.99........ no thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. Could you please contact our support from inside the app so we can have a look at your issue together?

scraped_reviews.content: The erase/restore portion of the cutout does not work properly after the update. The older version had a better detection of how far to cut out the picture from the background and it was much faster editing photos. Now, when it removes backgrounds from photos, it comes out all wonky and weird looking. There is no smoothness to the product. I hope this gets fixed because at this rate, I would rather just edit the pictures using another app since I am spending more time rediting pictures after.

This used to be an AMAZING app for posting professional looking product photos for free. Now they have taken away all the great aspects of the free part (like having some backgrounds for free and others for purchase to now having zero backgrounds for free). I was going to pay for the app because I used many of the features before, but charging $4.99 per WEEK is beyond ridiculous. I used to have a paid membership and it absolutely was not that expensive. Uninstalling because now what's the point?

title: DoorDash: Food, Grocery, More
description:
Delivery anywhere you are. DoorDash offers the greatest online selection of your favorite restaurants and stores, facilitating delivery of freshly prepared meals, groceries, OTC medicines, flowers & more. Shop same-day delivery and takeout with DoorDash. 

With more than 310,000 menus and 55,000+ grocery, convenience & retail stores across 4,000+ cities in the U.S., Canada, Australia, and New Zealand, you‚Äôll find the best of your neighborhood as you shop and order online. Plus, enjoy $0 delivery fees for your first order. Restrictions apply: https://drd.sh/tF5uns/

IT‚ÄôS ALL HERE
¬∑Restaurants: Food delivery from local & national restaurants
¬∑Grocery: Fulfill your weekly grocery list, from produce to diapers. Shop diets like gluten-free & vegan.
¬∑Drinks, Snacks & More: Sodas, candy & ibuprofen from stores like 7-Eleven & CVS
¬∑Flowers: Order fresh flowers for occasions like Valentine‚Äôs Day

KEY FEATURES
¬∑ Get it now: Get on-demand, same-day delivery
¬∑ Schedule deliveries: Order in advance and get it when it's most convenient for you.
¬∑ Real-Time Tracking: See when your order will arrive.
¬∑ No Minimums: Order as little or as much as you want.
¬∑ Easy Payment: Conveniently pay via Google Pay, Venmo, Paypal, credit card, or SNAP/EBT at participating Mx.
¬∑ No-Contact Delivery: Your food will be left in a safe place and you‚Äôll be alerted that it‚Äôs ready for you to pick up at your doorstep

ENJOY UNLIMITED $0 DELIVERY FEES WITH DASHPASS
Get unlimited $0 delivery fees and up to 10% off eligible orders from your neighborhood restaurants, grocery stores, and more. Plus, DashPass members get access to exclusive items and offers, and 5% in DoorDash credits back on eligible Pickup orders. Your first 30 days on DashPass are free, then your membership auto-renews at $9.99/month. Cancel anytime.

NATIONAL RESTAURANT PARTNERS
McDonald's, Starbucks, Chick-fil-A, Burger King, Wendy‚Äôs, Chipotle, The Cheesecake Factory, Outback Steakhouse, Panera, Chili's, Subway, Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, Jamba Juice, Panda Express, Moe's, P.F. Chang‚Äôs, Denny‚Äôs, Buffalo Wild Wings, Papa John's, Papa Murphy‚Äôs, Jack in the Box, Five Guys, Boston Market, Red Robin, TGI Friday‚Äôs, Red Lobster, Qdoba, El Pollo Loco, White Castle, SmashBurger

GROCERY DELIVERY PARTNERS
Safeway, Albertsons, Aldi, Sprouts Farmers Market, Meijer, Hy-Vee, Grocery Outlet, Winn-Dixie, Smart & Final, BJ‚Äôs, Vons, Weis, ACME, Raley‚Äôs, Fresh Thyme, Giant Eagle, Bashas‚Äô, Bristol Farms and more.

CONVENIENCE & RETAIL DELIVERY PARTNERS
Walgreens, 7-Eleven, CVS, Rite Aid, Dollar General, Wawa, Sheetz, Casey‚Äôs, Total Wine, BevMo!, PetSmart, Sephora, DICK'S Sporting Goods, Tractor Supply, and more

FIND RESTAURANTS AND STORES NEAR YOU
We‚Äôre growing and currently serving over 4,000 cities across the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand including cities such as New York City, Los Angeles, Toronto, Vancouver, BC, Melbourne, Sydney, Montreal and more.

Notice at Collection (California Residents): https://help.doordash.com/consumers/s/privacy-policy-us#section-11
Visit doordash.com to learn more.

¬∑ No-Contact Delivery: Your food will be left in a safe place and you‚Äôll be alerted that it‚Äôs ready for you to pick up at your doorstep

ENJOY UNLIMITED $0 DELIVERY FEES WITH DASHPASS
Get unlimited $0 delivery fees and up to 10% off eligible orders from your neighborhood restaurants, grocery stores, and more. Plus, DashPass members get access to exclusive items and offers, and 5% in DoorDash credits back on eligible Pickup orders. Your first 30 days on DashPass are free, then your membership auto-renews at $9.99/month. Cancel anytime.

NATIONAL RESTAURANT PARTNERS
McDonald's, Starbucks, Chick-fil-A, Burger King, Wendy‚Äôs, Chipotle, The Cheesecake Factory, Outback Steakhouse, Panera, Chili's, Subway, Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, Jamba Juice, Panda Express, Moe's, P.F. Chang‚Äôs, Denny‚Äôs, Buffalo Wild Wings, Papa John's, Papa Murphy‚Äôs, Jack in the Box, Five Guys, Boston Market, Red Robin, TGI Friday‚Äôs, Red Lobster, Qdoba, El Pollo Loco, White Castle, SmashBurger

GROCERY DELIVERY PARTNERS
Safeway, Albertsons, Aldi, Sprouts Farmers Market, Meijer, Hy-Vee, Grocery Outlet, Winn-Dixie, Smart & Final, BJ‚Äôs, Vons, Weis, ACME, Raley‚Äôs, Fresh Thyme, Giant Eagle, Bashas‚Äô, Bristol Farms and more.

CONVENIENCE & RETAIL DELIVERY PARTNERS
Walgreens, 7-Eleven, CVS, Rite Aid, Dollar General, Wawa, Sheetz, Casey‚Äôs, Total Wine, BevMo!, PetSmart, Sephora, DICK'S Sporting Goods, Tractor Supply, and more

FIND RESTAURANTS AND STORES NEAR YOU
We‚Äôre growing and currently serving over 4,000 cities across the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand including cities such as New York City, Los Angeles, Toronto, Vancouver, BC, Melbourne, Sydney, Montreal and more.

Notice at Collection (California Residents): https://help.doordash.com/consumers/s/privacy-policy-us#section-11
Visit doordash.com to learn more.
summary: Get food, grocery, and retail essentials delivered fast with DoorDash.

scraped_reviews.content: I've decided to update my review, yet again. My one star is now for the platform. I liked when I could see how much the delivery fee was going to be, now they all say $0, but that's for Dash-Pass, so don't get confused like I did. In order to know how much you'll spend with a non-Dash-Pass account, you have to waste time making the order and clicking continue to see how much you'll actually spend. It's kind of obvious that Dash-Pass accounts get $0 delivery fee, Door Dash!

Super expensive additional fees. Why isn't there an option under your orders to rate your driver? For instance, once the delivery is completed and I open the app, it will pop up a "rate the driver" whatever window, and if I misclick out of it, I cannot get back to or retrieve that pop up again. it shouldn't be that hard. The dashers deserve better since their scores affect the orders they get.

I had what I thought was a scathing review before, but the company has managed to outdo itself. Beyond terrible service, with dashers bringing the order to the wrong house or not picking it up at all, then having to deal with support to get a refund for a product they never delivered is too much. This service is supposed to make life easier, not more stressful. Far too expensive for the lackluster service they offer.

98% of my orders are always messed up. Food orders always missing food, cold, late, order from the stores and missing things. go to the store all items will be in stock. when dd messes up the order says have to cancel but doesn't offer immediate refund they take payment immediately. No I dont want credits for money out of my bank. A refund takes up to a week. there has been nothing convenient with this app just messy orders. ppl live pay to pay. if they mess it up needs to refunded instantly

Supposedly, customer service told me the rules/regulations do not require them to give refunds - when I didn't receive a food item that I ordered and paid for. I received 2 of the 3 things. They refunded me less than the cost of the missing item. No refund for the percentage of fees and tax either. I liked doordash until this experience. It's basically theft. I'm paying for a service. Didn't get what I paid for and didn't get properly refunded for what I paid for and didn't receive. Not worth it

5 years ago I rated this app 5 stars. A few weeks ago I edited it to 1 star, due to how often I had missing items in my orders. The past few weeks it has gotten worse, to the point where today I deleted my account and the app. Between how expensive all the fees have gotten, and how awful the service has gotten, it is no longer worth it. You're better off ordering directly from stores or just driving there yourself. This app is a waste of money and time.

Ordering is normally great, but suddenly, I have a pin on my account. Based on what I've read, it's from too many issues with my order being delivered. However, that is not possible when for the last 6 months I haven't had a single issue and I've only ever had 3 issues from orders not being delivered properly last year!! At first, I was able to toggle it off, but now I can't even do that, I want zero contact with my driver. Now I have to message them, which yes is an inconvenience.

Overpriced and not worth it . I've been subscribed to doordash for years and I spend something like 10-20k a year through the app. Over time, the service has deteriorated. Every issue they encounter, they push the burden and cost onto their customers. The one thing they had that kept me as a customer was their support when things go wrong. But now? Demanding photos? Adding layers to annoy the customer into not following through when they didn't receive the items they paid for? Nope, I'm done.

DoorDash lost a customer today. I've been with the app for years and spent Thousands (saved over $8k in fees with dashpass) but I can't continue to use them for the simple fact that a horrible McDonald's opened closer to my location, the worst rated one in the state and they won't let me choose the better one just down the road, but UberEats will, UE also has better UI, it's cheaper, they have discount codes all the time, you can upload drop off pictures and they have more menu options.

The delivery fee and "service fee" are astronomically high and you WILL NOT get refunded that cost when something goes wrong. If you order a 5 dollar item, the bill at the end will be somewhere around 10 bucks. Then, when you dont get your item, you get 5 bucks back and lose the 5 you spent on the delivery fee, service fee and tip.... robbery.

Not sure what happened but the app has gone downhill and become downright predatory. When you look at a restaurant, they will show you a very small delivery fee $2 or less. But after you make your order and get all the way to the checkout, it will go up to anywhere between $6 to $8! For one, that's already an egregious price, and secondly, that's a very nefarious practice. Bait and switch. If I were you, I'd go to Uber eats or somewhere else where they respect your wallet and don't play games.

Posting this issue here because nothing ever gets done about it. I had multiple door dashers having issues with finding my unit, despite the clear instructions on the address. One recently dropped my order off at the wrong unit. Each report only replies with "The type of issue submitted doesn't qualify for a refund or credit. However, we're always working to improve your experience and will note this feedback." Then the process only repeats. Food is always late.

Support can do nothing to help you if you do run into an issue other than give 5 dollar credits. So while the app is generally decent, if a big does mess up your order you basically have no recourse. In my case, it was forcibly switching a pick up order to delivery (where delivery would be almost 2 hours as no one is in my area). Once it went through, there was no recourse to do anything and couldn't cancel unless I wanted to eat 99% of the cost

I have had issues with missing items after missing items after missing items. I've never had this issue with Ubereats, like, EVER. I've ordered through doordash maybe 4 times, and ALL times, I've had missing items. Should've stopped ordering after the 2nd time. I guess 4 times a charm. The only good thing I can say is that I was refunded 2 times. However, I shouldn't have items missing all the time. Account deactivated.

Deceptive with hidden fees; delivery fee is displayed, but they also hide a "service fee" under the "taxes" section (just to clarify; it's not a tax), which can vary in cost. "Deals" price threshold also creep up overtime, which is a bit reminiscent of price fixing. Dash Pass advertises it removes delivery fees, but then like half the options have a fee anyways (and there is always a varying service fee). They also skim drivers tips.

i wrote a review almost 2 years ago and mentioned how they lie about merchant choosing to not accept special requests and 2 years later they still haven't corrected it. I'm so ready to leave this app and go to Uber eats but they are much more expensive unfortunately. I guess that's why door dash doesn't even care to fix such a small issue that could make a world of difference. sometimes you just want extra ketchup, damn. and yes I know you can call, but not all stores answer phone.

Not sure if it's a glitch with a recent update, but for some reason I'm not getting notifications if the dasher messages me (and yes all alerts/notifications are set to "on" so I should get both a text and an app alert). I have to manually open the order and check the order details to see if I have a message. I use the app mainly for groceries and this makes it very difficult when something is out of stock or the dasher needs my attention in a timely manner.

Updated review: This app is getting worse. Now it won't let you have the driver contact you or refund an item that you ordered if it's not available. The only option is for the merchant to substitute it with their suggestions, which won't work for me. I have food allergies, so I have to have the option of making my own substitution choices. Even without food allergies, the options should be up to the customer. Now it won't let me add another payment method to my account either.

I just had an experience where my food wasn't delivered and they were supposed to issue a redelivery. The previous dasher who didn't deliver my food would still receive the tip if I didn't ask them to adjust it. There were ongoing issues with the redelivery so they canceled it. I asked them to credit my original payment back to me but they stated it was a credit as it used for the redelivery. And basically just said sorry. There was no acceptable solution. I don't know what's going on with them.

So I had a missing item that was $1.30. I reported it missing and was offered a refund of $1.02. If I hadn't caught it and talked to support I would have not been fully refunded. I texted it to a friend saying "thats weird" and they have had something similar occur. Keep an eye out on the price of the items you need refunded and the refund they offer you cause that discrepancy should have never happened. $0.28 isn't a lot but if they do this across the board it adds up

Doordash is a complete disappointment. Maybe 5% of the time your order is actually correct. The rest of the time, something‚Äôs missing or wrong and customer support does absolutely nothing about it. They charge extra fees (over $4 just to use the app), yet refuse to refund the full amount for missing items. It‚Äôs frustrating and borderline scammy. The app barely works half the time, and you‚Äôre often left paying for food you never received. Save yourself the headache.

At least half of my orders have missing/incorrect items or they're delivered to the wrong location when I use this service. It's become worse over the last year. Even though my instructions are clear, they're ignored, and no adjustment is given for mishandled orders. I also submitted a safety concern when one of the dashers harassed me, and they did nothing. I reached out multiple times and was told they'd get back to me, but I never heard from anyone on a resolution.

The app is fine, until it isn't. My account was compromised, they made me cancel my account, but refused to give me access to the dashpass I'd already paid for. I made another account like I was suggested to, only for the account to be deactivated with no warning. I called support, they said they had "no information." I was sent 2 emails after my call. 1 said it was a mistake, and the other said I had violated terms of service but wouldnt say exactly what happened. awful support & communication.

Horrible experience. Going through Doordash to order groceries, is allowing very expensive extra charges; Example, inflating a markets coffee price by $3.00 per can plus delivery, plus tip. Your delivery service appears to earn a higher margin than the grocery chain itself. It's much more economical to order directly online from the grocery app. Seniors have to be more careful with budgeting their essentials than most others. Due to the current inflationary cycle, we are not alone!

Multiple problems: 1. Increased battery drain on my phone. It's practically on fire when DoorDash is active. If I uninstall or archive the app, the problem goes away. This is on the consumer app, not the Dasher app. 2. App notifications are broken. I've disabled all battery saving settings and allowed all notification channels, but the only notification I get that my payment was successful. If not for also having text messages turned on, I'd never know that my food was delivered.

After years of use they still have the same issues and doordash, the drivers, and the restaurants can't find a solution. About 50% of the time when I order I don't get my drinks. Their only solution is to refund the price of the drinks. Which doesn't help the situation at all. Because I either have to order a different drink and wait or go without. Why not just add a button that the driver has to confirm they got the drink whey they mark the order as picked up?

missing items or messed up items they always say they cant do anything about it. The customer service is horrible they expect you to be fast but they can take as long as they need to. Customer service is 99% of the time pointless. you get charged an annual fee to use the app but then still have a bunch of fees and the cost of the food is already more than in the stores/restaurants themselves.

PAY ATTENTION TO THESE REVIEWS! Doordash support is turning to AI only. They are about to get rid of the phone number that you could call them at. I cancelled Dashpass. On 3 recent occasions, I've ordered a few items, the store is out of the item and doesn't adjust the charge for the OUT OF STOCK item. Doordash will fight you tooth & nail and refuse to refund for items you paid for and didn't get. This is stealing. Especially happens at convenience/grocery stores like Wawa.

I'm not sure what is going on but I was charged twice for a monthly doordash pass. When I contacted customer service about being charged twice they cancelled my entire dashpass and lied about sending a refund. Then disconnected with me mid-sentence. Now I am unable to delete my credit card information from my account. I'm not sure what is going on but this is crazy coming from a large company like doordash. Wow!

Originally, I gave this app/service five stars. I don't know what's happened but I'm tired of being suckered into placing an order with an advertised timeframe just for the delivery window to be pushed back constantly and end up waiting twice as long for the order. And that's the average now, sometimes it's longer. Maybe I'm old fashioned but I believe that if your app/service advertises something it should be honored. I'm probably going to start using Instacart and only Instacart in the future.

Loved this app! But I had a 40% off promo code that disappeared. The whole promo is gone from my app/account. Customer service says they can't do anything without a screenshot of my promo!?!?!?!? Umm check my account...It was through November 15th, weeks away. When I googled it many others are having the same issue with the same response from customer service. Unacceptable!

door dash has gotten worse and worse over the years, and I'm forced to use it less and less. honestly once I'm good friends with a driver or two, I can commission them directly and skip this app completely. The driver's to get the food take an hour at least now, constantly see my order is ready to be picked up but the person who is supposed to is on other side of town. I hate that the delivery time estimate goes up as the driver takes longer. they also won't show you time you ordered. Shame

The food is consistently late and missing multiple items. When I call the restaurant, they insist the items were there when the order was picked up. I have never been refunded for missing items, as both the restaurant and Door Dash blame the other. I will no longer use this service, as I have wasted too much money buying things that I don't receive. I definitely do NOT recommend this service.

I like the convenience of being able to order stuff when I need to, especially considering my husband's a truck driver. It's come in handy for him many times. The biggest problem is that a lot of times the orders aren't right and trying to get customer service when an order is wrong is a nightmare. They also mark up the food item prices compared to the actual restaurant menu. Despite having Dash-pass the fees are just as bad as normal delivery somewhere else. You can never reach a live agent.

Annoying as hell. Doordash let me place a pickup order for a store that was closed and they dont even check the store operating hours to allow/not allow customer to place order. Am right in front of the store and store is closed. Doordash sends me ** message saying the order is ready for pick up .. There is no cancel option to get a refund. The customer care number was so hard to find within the app. Please fix it. "Your order from Kumar's Indian Food is ready. We hope you enjoy your order!".

This app does a lot of scam-adjacent things these days. for example, it'll offer you $25 off of an order after making three orders. You make the first order, the progress bar goes up. you make the second order, the progress bar goes up. you make the final order. time to cash in a promotion on the fourth one now, right?! üòÄ Well, no. they conned you. the entire 25 off promotional deal will suddenly dissapear from the user interface, but only on the final order. this is just one example.

I can't believe how bad this service is. it should be making life easier, instead it's just an expensive waste of time. I paid extra to get a quicker delivery only for the driver to deliver "several orders" before. unlucky for them, they're low jacked and I was able to see where they went before. Went to a different part of town and then several other stops before getting to my place. Food was cold when I got it. delivery time kept getting pushed back to cover their butts .......... disgraceful.

I've been a dashpass member since 2021 because their app was the easiest to use and the most cost effective. They used to actually help you when a problem happened with your order. Now if you don't receive one of your items, they make you jump through hoops to request help, then tell you "Oh well" and do nothing about it. Their prices have gotten so much worse, too. Overpriced and bad customer service. I canceled my dashpass subscription and I'll be moving to another app.

Complete scam for customers as well. Ridiculous prices as well for what is essentially only an app, and that isnt even decent. It feels like a bare minimum college project. Even with dash pass you're still paying hundreds in fees over the course of just a few months. If there's a problem with your order, good luck. The most I got was a 2 dollar refund. I couldn't believe it.

the restaurants are great. the dashers (when available) are great. the app is difficult to resolve issues with. I ordered food nearly two hours ago, and it only JUST got picked up. there is a fee to cancel an order if it's already been made, which would make sense if the app hasn't left my food to rot on a countertop. I would love to KNOW if there are no dashers available. I would rather pick up my own food or not order at all rather than pay a delivery fee for ice cold food.

I personally do not like that your order can take longer depending on your posted tip. First, most of the time I tip with cash. Second, I have tipped ahead of time and regretted doing so after receiving horrible service. That is on DoorDash. Lastly, I could not find where I could leave instructions to get sweetener with unsweet tea, or extra ketchup, or any other condiments. One thing I like is the option to add a second stop without an extra fee.

I've been an active customer since 2017, holding a dash pass membership most of that time as well. I order multiple times a month, most often several times a week. Fast food, restaurants, and even groceries. Their customer service has gone so far down hill that I am seriously considering trying competitors like UberEats and Postmates. if they forget items, receive less than tasty food that you don't even end up eating because it's so bad... they will try to issue you $3 on a $30+ order

The prices are inflated by 20 to 25% over actual menu prices and then they add fees on top of that. Now, the AI descriptions for menu items don't match the restaurants menu descriptions. which am I getting doordashes description of an item or the restaurants description of the item? Sometimes it makes a big difference and I'm not willing to pay the exorbitant fee to find out which it is.

As much as I want to use Doordash again, it's just too cumbersome to find a good restaurant on the platform and searching for a specific dish is a complete waste of time. It's nice that you can filter by rating, but there's no way to filter out grocery stores so that you just see restaurants and there's no sorting feature. Because of this and the extensive number of restaurants in the system, it makes finding what I'm looking for too time consuming, which ends up pushing me back to Uber Eats.

I didn't have this app, so I downloaded it just to write a review. Used 2 different phone numbers and 3 different emails to try to order food for pickup at a location I could walk to. Each time, the website, which uses DoorDash to fulfill pickup and delivery orders, gave me an error that said, "Your account has been deactivated or disabled." Absolutely ridiculous - don't even have one. This is a mishandled app and the negative reviews say it all; you and the restaurants are better off without.

I love doordash. It allows me to discover more places to try out that's around me. However, I noticed that Doordash tends to jack up the prices (even when you are the one picking it up). The restaurant can have the same item for 3 dollars cheaper than Doordash. This increase in charge doesn't even count as the service fee of the app itself.

I got a gift card from my work to order here. 25 dollars. I ordered and needed to change part of the order. I managed to get it cancelled through an agent, who would not refund my card for the part of the order that was processed through it. they then took all of my credits, and cancelled my card. so much for free lunch I guess. customer support is non existent, and hangs up on you to avoid bad reviews. the most frustrating app experience I've ever had.

There seems to be no vetting process for the drivers. More often than not, I've had problems with my deliveries such as drivers stealing my orders, not following basic instructions or arriving extremely late. On top of that, the fees are absolutely ridiculous. For most places, you're better off ordering directly from their website and picking it up yourself to spare the headache and 20 dollars in junk fees.

Everything is way more expensive and the tip ranges start so high(tip culture is awesome btw. Rather than reward people for doing well, I have to incentivize them to actually bother delivering it). I don't like paying double just to get something delivered. I have to choose between getting no sales notifications ever or getting told to buy groceries every day. Add a dark theme for all users. Also, a refund will never cover the cost to ship the item back to you.

This was my first time using the service. Honestly not a fan. I ordered 3 items. There was only one item in stock at a retail price of 5.49. There was not a notification that the other two items were "out of stock". ok they did not have the specific flavor. So with just the one item the real cost was 234% higher with all the added cost. I really hate the tip before you receive the items. I tipped based on the total cost. Not just just receiving one 5 dollar item.

title: CLZ Comics comic book database
description:
Easily catalog your comic collection. To add comics to your app, just scan the cover with your device camera. The app will recognize the comic and will automatically provide issue details, cover art, creator lists and more.

CLZ Comics is a paid subscription app, costing US $1.99 per month or US $19.99 per year.
Use the free 7-day trial to try all of the app's features and online services!
Optional: Get comic values from CovrPrice at US $90 extra per year.

== Four ways to catalog your comics books ==
1. Just take pictures of the covers and let the app recognize them. Super easy.
2. Scan comic barcodes. Fast and accurate for modern comics.
3. Find a series by title, then checkbox the issues you own. 
4. Search a specific issue by title and issue number.

== Automatic issue details from CLZ Core ==
Our CLZ Core comic database automatically provides cover art and full comic details, like Series, Issue Nr, Publisher, plot, creator lists, character lists, backdrop art, etc... including key comic information, like first appearances.

== Edit all fields ==
You can edit all automatically provided details from CLZ Core, like the series, issue number, variant description, release/cover dates, plot descriptions, creator and character listings etc.. you can even upload your own cover art (front and back!). You can also add personal details like storage box, grade, slab label types, purchase date / price / store, notes, etc.. 

== Create multiple collections ==
Collections will appear as Excel-like tabs at the bottom of your screen. E.g. for different people, to separate physical from digital comics, to keep track of comics you sold or have for sale, etc... 

== Optional: get comic values from CovrPrice ==
Optional in-app purchase, at US $90 per year.
Get accurate and up-to-date comic values from CovrPrice, for both raw and slabbed comics.

== CLZ Cloud storage ==
* Always have an online backup of your comic tracker database.
* Sync your comic library between multiple devices
* View and share your comic collection online

= 24/7 customer support ==
We are always ready to help or to answer your questions, 7 days a week.
Just use "Contact Support" or "CLZ Club forum" from the menu.

== Other CLZ apps ==
* CLZ Movies, for cataloging your DVDs, Blu-rays and 4K UHDs
* CLZ Books, for organizing your book collection by ISBN
* CLZ Music, for creating a database of your CDs and vinyl records
* CLZ Games, for making a database of your video game collection

== About CLZ ==
CLZ has been developing collection database software since 1996. Located in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, the CLZ team now consists of 12 guys and one gal. We're always working to bring you regular updates for the apps and software, and to keep our Core online databases up-to-date with all weekly NCBD releases.

== What our users say: ==
"Perfect for a comic collector! Well worth the yearly price! And it keeps getting better!"
Kari P (USA)
 
"This is amazing. I access to my entire comic collection in my pocket. It‚Äôs easy to use and makes collecting fun! The integration with CovrPrice puts this at app on a whole new level. Highly recommended!"
ddulek (USA)
 
"I have been using the app to catalog my close to 1500 comics. I just recently signed up for CovrPrice which works in conjunction with CLZ to give you values of your raw and graded comics. Customer support is very prompt at resolving any issues or questions u may have."
Michael Almanza (USA)
 
"Awesome program, easy to add comics, syncs the comic inventory to servers so you never lose your collection. highly recommend!"
A BoMb (USA)
 
"Extremely well built app. Excellent customer service and prompt reactions to customer feedback and requests. Constantly on the forefront of the needs and flexibility for the customer. This app and team ROCKS!!!"
Count Dracul (USA)
