summary: Catalog your collection. Just scan covers with your device camera. (US $20/yr)

scraped_reviews.content: I tried other apps. This one was the easiest to get started with, and has the most options for describing and cataloging your collection. Subscription fee is very reasonable in my opinion, and you can optionally add a subscription to the Covrprice pricing guide with a discount if you sign up for both. If you have a large collection like I did, from back in the 90's and you want it organized fast, this is the app you want. Also, they have been super helpful and quick to respond to any questions.

It is the most configurable comicbook management platform I've come across and is well worth the subscription. Being able to match issues to Core and changing any field you want is super useful. I subscribed for a year and will be doing so for years to come. My only wish is that it would be cheaper to subscribe to Books, Games and Video as a bundle.

Expensive. multiple subscriptions for full service. One price point for cataloging, another additional cost for pricing comics. This is not clear until you start a trial or have paid for the base subscription. Customer service is also dreadful. When I cancelled I was prompted with a survey to share feedback. The customer service representative argued with me about my opinion. Similar to what's happening here. Get it, don't. Just don't share an opinion. They apparently can't handle it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The app description clearly explains that the comic pricing service is an extra add-on from a third party. Sorry to hear you missed that!

scraped_reviews.content: You would be foolish not to use CLZ. This app is perfect for keeping track of your collection and what you have read, and the customization options are countless. Using CLZ has been an absolute game changer for me (not an overstatement, I promise), and it has been years since I ended up with a dreaded duplicate book or anything like that. Highly recommend!

I believe I downloaded this app about 4 or more years ago. Not only has the app consistently improved, but the customer service has always been amazing! I have multiple long boxes of comics and when I go to purchase more, I can easily find which issues I'm missing in a series or which cover art I don't have. So much detail can be inputted I feel as if I'm under utilizing the app. Highly recommend.

This is an amazing app, far superior to anything else out there.  I've recommended it to many friends (the desktop version too) and I regularly contribute updates to the database for all the comics I own because I believe in the product.  It says a lot about the app that after 6+ years, I only had one minor problem and it was patched in less than 24 hours!

Genius app makes comic book collecting (when you have thousands of comics) a breeze to catalog so you can know without going and looking through them all to remember if you have an issue. Thank God! There's even editing the issues as in the prices, etc. So you know the date you purchased if you want an original price to help know profits and declines in value, etc.

Overall great app, worth the price (especially for larger collections)! I love that I no longer have to maintain my own spreadsheet. Provides tons of information, saving me weeks of research to prepare for cons. However, I'd like to see more consistency of the "Contributor" information to prevent duplicate entries (i.e. Jon vs Jonathan). Also, I don't like how all the variant artists are being listed in each variant instead of just their cover. Overall great app, worth the price.

Best App EVER for Comic Collection. The App (for phone) and Cloud (for Web browser) are super easy, well designed and laid out beautifully. The support is always spot-on and quick. I researched high and low for an app to help me inventory my collection. In fact, I tried too many before I bought this one. I use it every time I'm in a comic shop or online shopping. I convinced my brother to get it too, and he loves it. My wife uses their movies collection, and loves it. Awesome job, guys!

I downloaded the trial version after a trusted Youtuber recommended it. After realizing that the 100-book limit wouldn't even cover my trades, I shelled out for the full thing and have not been disappointed with it so far. There are a few of my older trades that are surprisingly absent from the database (that or they're categorized VERY strangely), but so far I'm fully digging it.

Update: Alwin and his team are awesome!! They keep you informed about all changes and what's coming down the line. I been collecting for over 37yrs, this app has been a major upgrade to my collection (thousands of physical books, easy to add, locate and edit the info you need. Tells you if they are major and minor keys, I could go on for days. Don't believe me give this app a try for yourself!!

For comic collectors this is a need. Love being able to tract everything. Easy to use and find stuff. This is my go to app for adding comics & adding to my wishlist! The CLZ team is fantastic at replying with any issues or if they missed a comic and get it added to the database! You can edit everything from photos, pricing, information, etc. Highly recommend this app!

If I could get the real market value for the comics that I'm scanning and storing on the app would make it a perfect 5/5 for me. I love all the information you gain about a specific comic. Especially when you can determine a key or not without too much research. I highly recommend for those looking for something easy and efficient.

I was looking for an app to help me keep track of my collection and this seems to be the one! Being subscription based I was a bit reluctant when I downloaded this app. I compared it and 2 others comic cataloguing apps, but 2 things won me over. One was that, being a gi Joe collector they even had the issues that were exclusive to the toys and also being an indie fan, they have had all the stuff ive searched. And number 2, and most important reason I like this app- customer support!

This app has everything I need as a collector. I can scan my comics in using the barcode scanner, I can enter the grade of my slabs to get a value (based off of what it has recently sold for online) and the app inventories my books by issue and alphabetical order, not to mention the fact that it uploads the cover art as well. The customer service is some of the best I have dealt with, as long as they are awake you are sure to receive a quick response üòâ

I set up an account for the free trial and was blown away by how comprehensive and easy to use this app is. If you want to catalog your comics, it doesn't get better than CLZ. For only $15 a year, it's a steal. The days of buying duplicates because I can't remember if I already have something are gone, which will more than make up for the annual cost! üòÇ

The app exceeded my expectations in terms of quality, ease of use, and power. It quickly and easily finds even obscure comics, displays your collection nicely, provides values referenced to gocollect, and is really a joy to use. I was just looking to document my collection and the app met my needs and more. It's actually made me want to get back in to comic collecting more actively!

This is a great app. I am not sure what I would do without it. Easily add comics with barcode scanning, and view collection at a glance, with statistical data. Tie in with CovrPrice helps maintain value of collection and quick price check on the fly when purchasing comics. This app has saved me from buying duplicate comics frequently. App support is wonderful as well either through email or through their Facebook group. Highly recommend to the casual comic buyer or serious collector.

Awesome app! It helps me organize all my comics, figure out how much everything is worth and more helpful little detailed tools and perks than any of the other apps ive used so far. I paid the membership fee after the trial and say its worth every penny. Also the barcode scanner is accurate so it makes the input of new and old comics so easy to upload.

I got back into comic collecting again because of this app. It's easy to use, affordable & has every field a collector would want. Their database is more extensive than anything I've seen, plus it's updated every (week) day. I've gotten many friends to get this app & found I use mine more than any other app I have. I can't recommend it enough.

I've been obsessed with this app for YEARS. I've saved so much money by no longer buying duplicates I had forgotten I already owned, and it sure as hell beats carrying around a handwritten list or notebook. It also helps with storage organization since you can enter storage info right in the app, as well as signature, slabs, and other pertinent data. This app is incredible, I highly recommend to all who buy comics.

Best way to keep track of your collection! I've been collecting for over 30 years and have used almost every program out there...from CDs to other online websites to other apps and CLZ is the only one to keep up with me. Download it and just buy the base subscription and you'll be happy. JUST make sure you backup constantly as not be screwed if you need to replace your phone (like I did recently)

This app saved me tons of time from having to create spreadsheets to keep track of my collection, for me my family to keep them seperate from each other. I like the updates and progress that happens with the app. I tell everyone I about this app at my local comic shop, it's a must have app for my 3500+ collection to keep track of them all. Plus, I can add manually for books thay aren't in the database. Keep up the good work and keep updating and changing with the times an the app will outlive me

I was looking for a way to maintain a record of my comic collection, and like many others, I'm sure, I dreaded going the spreadsheet route or some generic database. CLZ had a pre-packaged, evolving solution. It is incredibly detailed and comprehensive. It has such an abundance of features, tweaks, and little extras that I sometimes forget how to manage them. It's everything I hoped for in a comic collection app and more. It is WELL worth the investment!

Been a desktop customer since version 3, but a car accident forced me to have to transfer to the mobile app. Took me a few days to get familiar with where things were, but for the most part the transition was pretty easy. Alwin and his team are very responsive to any issues that arise. There is also a support forum for user discussion as well. Overall, very happy with the app

This Far it's been great, The only trouble I had was adding Batman The Killing Joke, Couldn't scan it, and when I tried to find the particular issue, it wouldn't come up. Figured out the best way was to type Batman into the series box, and scroll down until I found it. Have had fun with the app, going through my son's collection with him, Looking at comic books, scanning them, occasionally reading them lol. It's a great app, give it a try you won't be disappointed.

Makes organizing my comics & seeing what I have so much easier. I would suggest a real-time database to track grade in conjunction with the value & to consider whether it's a signed comic & signed by whom. I know it'll be a work in progress but hopefully it's something you're already working on. No. It tracks for a few but not many.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jesse, thanks for you feedback. I am a bit confused about your "grades, values and signed comics" comment though. Isn't that exactly what we added in version 5.0, a couple of weeks ago?

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, saving me A LOT of time when digging through boxes, and now letting me get a handle on my collection. The biggest annoyance? The scan by barcode is almost worthless, as it doesn't work well with the camera, so it is often distorted or just can't read the barcode. So it takes a lot longer to add a varied collection, but still I'm happy with it. Edit: it seems like the scanning works better now, but admittedly, I'm only adding a few at a time now that I have the initial database.

I feel the price was way too expensive for what all is given. I'd like to see more features added on like a browser feature instead of only being able to look up by titles. Also I'd like to see a price value for the books and overall collection. I do like the app and it's going to be great help keeping track of what I have. But I'm having issues with the scanner, sometimes ojust won't read. Or it does it doesn't always select the book if your scanning a variant.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Secter, thanks for your feedback. First, the app does provide comic values, maybe you missed that feature? Can you maybe contact us at help.clz.com so that we can help you with the problems you see?

scraped_reviews.content: I used their products a decade ago on my PC and now I'm using them on my other devices. Scanning books in using my phone's camera is both simple and fast. The database has plenty of fields to track and their cloud service works simply and easily. I cannot recommend this app enough to anyone with a collection larger than a single long box of comics.

Really like app., Was at first concerned about the time it was going to take to enter my collection. I have close to 10k comics and most don't have bar codes. But found that once you have title added to your collection it's as fast to enter in a new issue as it is to scan barcode. Only thing I would change is a option to add box its stored in on main page. But it's not to time consuming to edit box and other personal info into the App. Overall a great app.

Best app for organizing your comics, PERIOD. All of my data is safe and secure, and I can transfer it to any device when I'm ready! My only suggestion is when they give you the option to edit your comic before placing it in the proper catagory you can't see the title on the top so if you're like like me where you forget in an instant, this is frustrating as I have to keep going back and forth and starting completely over when I'm ready to add my comic books from 'on wishlist' to 'in collection'
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew, good to hear you like the app. Could you please contact us at help.clz.com to explain your suggestion?

scraped_reviews.content: This App is amazing, absolutely amazing. Before this app I don't even remember how I kept track of the comics I had or needed. With this app it allows you to keep complete account of all the comics you have, and has an great, easy way to add new ones to the list, as well as removing some from the list. It has great pics, and lists of those that created the comic. Each and every one. As well as having a short summary of the story on most. What I am saying is GET THIS APP NOW for your collection.

Without question the BEST comic book inventory app available. This is a must have for every comic collector. Once you input a few comics and go through all of it's features, you'll quickly realize the value of the small one time charge to be able to store an unlimited amount of comics to your library. The customizable library options along with all the detailed data available to manually enter or scan for each comic makes it easy to view and organize. MUST HAVE!

I wish it were easier for me to me to add third party comics, but otherwise this app had been great! I can track which issues I'm missing across all my all my longboxes. I can make my own notes about issues, organize my comics by series, longbox, publisher, creators, and more. I can track grades and pricing. Basically, this app does everything that I need and more. And it is constantly updated for the major publishers so adding a comic from Marvel/DC/Dark Horse/etc is super easy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi SixSins 6, thanks for your feedback. Can you please contact us at help.clz.com to explain what you mean by "third party comics"?

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great! It makes keeping track of your collection so easy. Perfect for when you are back filling missed or earlier issues. Barcodes may not always match up on older comics but there are still several ways to search and add titles/issues quickly. I've added the Web Software to my subscription to help sort and tidy up everything. Plenty of options for viewing your collection. Download your collection into excel after you scan all your books or send link to list held on cloud.

Good app for sorting and collecting comics. It allows you to edit and personalize information. However their share feature is off app and requires a paid subscription which isn't cool. My only other gripe is there is no clear way to upload personally filed comics. I had to make my own entries for a few comics, but they aren't in the over all database.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matt, the share feature, through the CLZ Cloud, is completely free. No paid subscription needed.

scraped_reviews.content: This has certainly been one of the more helpful apps that I have bought. Does a great job of helping me keep track of my collection. No more accidentally buy issues I already have. My one wish is that it gave a ballpark value for each issue. Love that everything is backed up to a cloud too. Makes switching phones easier. I only wish the price list was more complete.

I've been using this app before it went sub based. It's really great. The only thing this CLZ is missing is a way to show a list of what you're missing from a collection. For example, let's say I have Amazing Spiderman 1-200 then 215-350. I wish there was an option to list what I'm missing from the series, so when I'm out at comic shops or convention I have a quick list of what books I'm missing. Idk just a thought.

This is overall a decent app, from what I have been able to do with it so far. That said, one thing that would be really nice, that I haven't seemed to have found on the app, is an easy way to sort by creators. It does it for a lot of other categories (series, publisher, etc.)...but it would be nice if, for example I was looking for books in my collection to take to a signing, to be able to easily see what I have by that artist/writer/what have you. Otherwise, dig it so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Geoffrey, thanks for your feedback. Use Creators as the folder option would indeed be cool, in fact, we are implementing that at this very moment, coming up within 2 weeks!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really enjoying this app. I've never used a program like this before because I never found one with an extensive catalog of Golden Age and Independent books. Not a problem so far. ü§ûüèæ In my opinion the only thing that would make this app. perfect would be if it automatically inputed the present value of all books. I would trade hot and trendy information for a reliable source like Overstreet for all the books in my collection.

Short and sweet: I love everything about it. I really have no complaints. If I can't find a comic, I've been able to email and get help or have it added. I don't catelog for value, tho, so if that's important to you to be able to look up value, then maybe this isn't for you. Maybe in the future it'd be nice to see notations on key comics, though. Like 1st appearances, deaths, etc.

A lot more in depth than I need(with stuff for grading and slabbing that I will never use since my collection is for reading), but it does a great job keeping track of all the comics AND manga books my wife and I have. My only gripe is that even when scanning US released manga, the cover art often pulls in the Japanese cover or an "art not final" cover instead of the real thing. Thankfully we can update them manually but that can be time consuming.

This app is a game changer. I've been keeping a log of everything on Google Sheets for a long time, but this very quickly replaced my long-time trusty database. With backup to the cloud, bar code scanning, and statistics to boot, keeping track of my library has never been easier. After scanning the bar codes, CLZ organizes everything by series which makes it easy to see at a glance if you're missing a book in between. Super convenient to pull up while shopping, too!

So far, it's been a great experience. Found one or two errors across the thousands I've added, which is pretty good. It has quite a lot of obscure stuff. It includes manga. Probably one of the more accurate, customizable options available for comic book organization. Worth the yearly sub. Covrprice is not worth the unlimited subscription required to pair with CLZ. At best, it can give a ballpark value. It didn't have data for around 400 of my books, including trades, manga, and hardcovers.

This is a good app for organizing a large comics collection. I had a bit of trouble setting up at first, but customer service was very responsive. I have 40 long boxes of comics, am about 6 boxes in, and I've only found 3 small press/independent comics so far that the app didn't recognize. In those cases, you can make your own listing. The price is very reasonable.

Downloaded this app anout 2 months and tried it out before writing a review. The newer comics were easy to input, just scan the barcode and the app shows you a picture of the comic and you tap to add it to your collection. There are times it shows the wrong one. Scan issue 9 it shows issue 2. After a couple of attempts it usually shows the whole series and you choose which one you have. Great for knowing what I have.I don't think the price guide part is very accurate. Need more room for review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew, thanks for your review. I suspect there is a misunderstanding about the adding of comics by barcode. Could you contact us at help.clz.com so that we can help you with that?

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using CLZ Comics for a couple of years now, and it's become a vital tool to manage my collection and sales. It's very intuitive and easy to make small simple changes or sweeping and complicated adjustments to my database, with more ways to organize a collection and more customizable book details I could ever use. It's just a superb app, and support is amazing as well, with quick and detailed responses and troubleshooting walkthroughs. This is truly a world class app!

Absolutely incredible. Recently started to get into collecting comics (Mostly Jack of Hearts related) and it's been difficult to find a service which has most of the more obscure stuff already catalogued somewhere. This app is super easy to use out of the box and is a great companion to the main website. To get the most out it you need to subscribe to the monthly service but it's literally such a small fee you can get all 3 options (Mobile, Windows, and Web) for around $8/Mth. Worth every penny.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Al, just to clarify, no one needs all 3 options. You only need either mobile+web OR mobile+windows.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know how I didn't have this app, the more I use it the more I like it . The developers are friendly and have great communication. Don't bother waisting your time or money on "cheaper" apps, clz is well worth the modest cost. All comics are available in database, all you have to do is check them off and they are automatically organized alphabetically, by title and issue, plus you have almost unlimited options to customize your preferences. Makes collecting alot more fun.

title: LightInTheBox Online Shopping

Millions of good fashion, all in one app.

As a global fashion shopping station, Lightinthebox brings you affordable and latest trends in style to meet your daily needs. Whether you are looking for ethic vintage style or funny animal prints, gorgeous party looks or comfortable casual basics, you can always find what you want here. 
From everyday street wears to festive party outfits, we promise you various in-trend fashion choices, to release your beauty and power, and to express yourself confidently.

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give zero stars I would! I ordered stuff for my son to wear to a dance. When I ordered it said we would get it within 10 days. Over a month and a half later we received the order. Dance has already gone and past. I had to go buy another suit elsewhere Tried to cancel the order and they wouldn't let me. Upon receipt of the products, the shoes fit too small. We even ordered a size up. The suit fits too big, despite getting his size. The hat was completely smashed. Will never order again
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre truly sorry for the delays and issues you experienced. We understand how important this order was, and we apologize for not meeting your expectations. Please contact our customer service team so we can resolve the situation, whether through a return, exchange, or refund. We appreciate your feedback and will work to improve our services.

scraped_reviews.content: The site has alot of interesting and unique items. The flash sales have really great pricing. However the processing and shipping times are very slow. For the amount charged for shipping, it needs to be greatly improved. Also the tracking leaves a lot to be desired. Sizing for clothing is completely off. I ordered 2 sizes up and the pants are still way too tight in the waist as well as too short. Non clothing items have proven to be adequate. I will watch for flash sales on non clothes items.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback. We‚Äôre glad you enjoy our unique items and flash sale pricing. We‚Äôre continuously working to improve shipping speed, tracking accuracy, and sizing consistency. Your comments help us get better, and we appreciate you giving us the chance to improve your experience. üíõ

scraped_reviews.content: Complete scam! They show pictures of products and then send you something cheap that's not what was pictured at all. It takes like a month to arrive and then they make it impossible to get your money back. They won't even allow you to leave a bad true review with photos on the product to help others, they keep blocking it if it's a bad review. Complete scammers!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre truly sorry to hear about your frustrating experience. üòû That‚Äôs not the service we want for our customers. Please know product images are meant to reflect actual items, and we take feedback seriously. We invite you to submit a new ticket so our support team can assist you with a return or refund promptly.

scraped_reviews.content: I've very disappointed in this company. I ordered items one month ahead of time for a special event. My items took over a month. A week and half after the event, my products finally came. I've tried placing a review on each item, with pictures, and it will not take my reviews. The items all had something wrong with it. Also, when I checked where items were coming from, it stated within the United States here. It was coming from China. I was charged a $30 shipping fee. Tracking was horrific.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre truly sorry for the disappointment and inconvenience you‚Äôve experienced. üôè Delayed delivery, shipping confusion, and product issues are not the standard we aim for. Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback‚Äîit helps us improve. Please contact our support team with your order details so we can review and assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: I love shopping at this new online store I've found. It has the best variety of so many things...women's blouses that are beautiful, elegant and stylish. I purchased the most perfect red embellished sparkly sequined red velvet top to wear for the holidays! They have shoes, mugs, scarves, decorations, Jewelry and more! The prices are great too! I'll be going back soon to buy some more wonderful things I saved in my cart. ‚ú®LIGHT IN THE BOX‚ú®
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your glowing review! ‚ú® We‚Äôre thrilled you‚Äôre loving our variety and that your red sequined velvet top was a holiday hit! üéÅ Your enthusiasm and support mean so much to us. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back for more beautiful finds at LightInTheBox! üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: When you try to exchange something, the app won't let you fill in. The reasons why you want to exchathey don't refund you. Once I got the tracking number you have to wait for 5 weeks. That's not the way you do business. You get a tracking number, you reimburse the person or you ship out. The replacement items I think this is the last time I'll ever order.And if somebody doesn't get a hold of me , i'm gonna get a hold of federal trade commission
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre very sorry for the frustration and delays you‚Äôve experienced. That‚Äôs not the standard we aim for. Please reach out to our support team with your order number so we can urgently review your exchange and get this resolved. Your trust matters, and we want to make this right immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't buy anything from here; it's a scam. I placed an order the first time, and the dress was cheap and nothing like the picture. They convinced me to take a half return and a coupon for free shipping, and I took it, which they didn't tell me the return was on store credit. So I was literally forced to order something else, and my mistake, I ended up buying something else, and the new order was horrible... horrible. They want me to pay 25 to 40 dollars to return it to an Asian warehouse.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience and frustration. We strive for transparency and quality but understand returns can be costly due to international shipping. Please reach out to our support team so we can better assist you and find a resolution.

scraped_reviews.content: This is my first experience with this shopping platform. I've been with Amazon for years, but I buy from them what I can't get from local stores, or what they sell cheaper. Light In The Box had an item I've been wanting for years but could not find, an oil pot. Depending on shipping speeds, customer service and satisfaction with goods received, I will amend my post here with an update in the future. UPDATE: Received my Oil pot, and a small whole chicken. It turned out great! Love it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for giving us a try and for sharing your thoughts! We hope your oil pot arrives quickly and meets your expectations. We‚Äôre here if you need any help along the way and look forward to your update. Welcome to the Light In The Box community!

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS APP. The items look nothing like the pictures. The material is incredibly cheap and they all are just printed designs. The dresses that look like they are linen with ruffles and collars are just printed on. They don't say everything is shipped from China (takes forever). Items were out of stock, no back orders. I wanted to return most of my items. Not only is there a customs form to fill out at the post office, but it would've been $110 for postage. What a scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience and truly value your feedback. We strive to provide accurate product descriptions and quality items. Shipping times can vary due to customs, but we‚Äôre here to assist with returns and questions. Please contact our support team so we can help resolve this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered compression socks, 2 different styles. They were quick to withdraw the payment from my bank account and tell me in a few days they were shipped...then: nothing!! It took 3.5 weeks to receive them. No updates from them on status. I could check status, but it would be something vague, about exports or imports or ships! Then when I finally got them (couldn't afford to buy others in meantime), they hurt my feet/legs, they were so tight! They blocked my emails re: a refund! Never again!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre very sorry for the delay and inconvenience üôè. Shipping updates can sometimes be vague due to customs and transit. As for the socks, our size guide is measurement-based, so fit may vary. Please submit a return request from your account‚Äîwe‚Äôll gladly help you with the process to resolve this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: App review: The app is fine. Like any app, it works. Product review: I've received 1 of my 2 orders so far. Items do come from China, shipping is good considering that. Some fabrics are thin. Some are not. Always watch sizing! That is a big issue, because it isn't feasible to pay to return. You pay for your own return. Even when I followed the size chart I still had sizing issues. Their prices are very cheap, so you risk not being able to wear the clothing yourself. Trade off price/size

As much as I wanted to order some things, the shipping was expensive. If you spread the shipping costs across the cart items, it turns out the products aren't that cheap after all. The refund process is also very manual and outdated. All that said, there is no benefit of shopping on this app. Most retailers offer free shipping on purchases over a certain amount, and the returns are automated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Different shipping methods are offered, with the expedited option being our premium service, which cost extra because of the guaranteed ultra rapid delivery.
There are cheaper shipping alternatives, our 'priority line' has the right balance between cost and short delivery time, with packages taking on average 10 days to reach at your doorstep!

scraped_reviews.content: I had a problem where every time I tried to submit a return ticket for a poorly constructed dress, I was given a system error try again later pop up. This happened over the course of a few days. I contact CS a different way and explained what was happening and included pictures. They resolved the issue very quickly with a full refund. I very much appreciated that. It would be good to add a quick access to customer service for situations like these errors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We regret reading about the difficulties faced. We firmly believe returning an item should be easy and straightforward.
Numerous parcels are being returned to our warehouse.
We invite you to submit a new ticket,1 of our after-sales agents will continue to assist with the return and obtain a refund/exchange with the least amount of trouble!

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered an 8 dollar ponytail hair clip, let me say I was extremely surprised with quality. The hair is synthetic, but I was able to straighten it and it kept its shine. Am getting ready to order a few more things and I will keep you posted. My only negative is the shipping was a little longer than I wanted, but it was not late. Gone shopping lightinthebox!!

All of the items I have received are cheap, but not price wise. The cost of shipping doubles the cost of the actual product. In fact, I wanted to return the items I got for a refund of the $80+ dollars I spent, and I got $20 back. This was for two products. I was able to get a 30% refund for both products instead of paying for shipping to China and getting even less back. The app itself is choppy and glitchy. Save your money and go to Shein or something.

Not finding anywhere in the app a way to contact customer service directly. Order is not showing up anywhere in either unpaid or any other category even though debit to my checking account shows the amount pending. Not a happy camper at this point. Order is almost $100 with the so called expedited shipping ( won't fall for that one again) . Wish I could say I am having as good of an experience as you other folks seem to have had. But to this point unhappily I can't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Found your order was made yesterday,we plan to ship it next week. It appears a typo error was made while registering your account, instead of '@hotmail' you've entered '@hotmsil',to see the order,you'll need to sign in to this account, by using the erroneous domain. If urgent, we can split the order, dispatch items we have in stock in a 1st parcel.

scraped_reviews.content: I bought a coat advertised as a women's winter parka. The photos were very nice and appeared to be a well insulated coat suitable for enduring cold temperatures. Even reviews from other so called buyers were very positive and satisfactory. When I received the item 3 weeks later I was completely disappointed and upset. The "coat" ran smaller than advertised and very flimsy. At best it is usable for early spring or late fall but certainly not a winter coat,won't shop here again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are really sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction.

Based on what you wrote you shouldn't find any troubles obtaining an immediate refund!
Sourcing manager will take this further with the supplier, Substandard products will be removed from our website.

scraped_reviews.content: Never gets the orders out on time always takes at least a month to get your order to you. It took three weeks to process my payment last time nothing is ever on time. I do not recommend shopping on this website. And then if you want your money back you have to wait and wait and wait, and then you have to put it back on your card. It don't go straight back to your card. This app sucks. Not going to change my mind. Unless you send everything you have ruined for christmas an now v.day.. Sucks!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Customer, sorry to hear that. Please could you advise your order number?

scraped_reviews.content: I have had this app for a couple months and decided to finally order. My first order went smoothly except they said that one item was delayed. Ended up not being delayed and receive my order within 3 weeks. In the meantime they sent me an email saying for the inconvenience they would issue me a discount. That turned into a problem with customer service, with me asking them if they understood English after a point. The issue was resolved and I did get my discount. All in all the app is okay.

Ordered henley shirts. Prints looked great in the pictures. Most disappointed. Cheap material. Colors faded to the point they all looked used and worn out. Was really looking foward to the red paisley when it finally came i could not believe it looked nothing like the picture. Very misleading i feel i did not get what i paid for. I will never order from here again. A real shame. They could have been honest and showed what you were really were buying.

scraped_reviews.content: I wish I could say I had a good experience with Lightinthebox, but im very disappointed. The sizes for clothing ran small , & you're out in shipping fees trying to return items, which costs more money, than originally spent, to return it back. They don't offer free return labels or labels to keep track of items unlike Ebay or Amazon, henceforth why shipping wise it costs more than all the money spent on item originally altogether! My experience so far is has been very upsetting.

scraped_reviews.content: The light in the box app/on line store is a total waste of time and money. Their product descriptions are grossly inaccurate, the pictures don't match the products and their customer service and support is virtually non-existant. Do yourself a favor and shop anywhere else! The app is trash. scraped_reviews.content: Everything is great. Is what my first6 review said. And it for the most part was hard to complain but in the end they got me. scraped_reviews.content: great products, lots of choices for about anything you could want. good pricing. if I like something but find it too expensive I can usually find it here, cheaper. title: Discord - Talk, Play, Hang Out
description:
Discord is designed for gaming and great for just chilling with friends or building a community. Customize your own space and gather your friends to talk while playing your favorite games, or just hang out.

GROUP CHAT THAT‚ÄôS ALL FUN & GAMES
‚àô Discord is great for playing games and chilling with friends, or even building a worldwide community. Customize your own space to talk, play, and hang out in.

MAKE YOUR GROUP CHATS MORE FUN
‚àô Create custom emoji, stickers, soundboard effects, and more to add your personality to voice, video, or text chat. Set your avatar, a custom status, and write your own profile to show up in chat your way.

STREAM LIKE YOU‚ÄôRE IN THE SAME ROOM
‚àô High-quality and low-latency streaming makes it feel like you're hanging out on the couch with friends while playing a game, watching shows, looking at photos, or idk doing homework or something.

HOP IN WHEN YOU‚ÄôRE FREE, NO NEED TO CALL
‚àô Easily hop in and out of voice or text chats without having to call or invite anyone, so you can chat with your friends before, during, and after your game session.

SEE WHO‚ÄôS AROUND TO CHILL
‚àô See who‚Äôs around, playing games, or just hanging out. For supported games, you can see what modes or characters your friends are playing and directly join up.

ALWAYS HAVE SOMETHING TO DO TOGETHER
‚àô Watch videos, play built-in games, listen to music, or just scroll together and spam memes. Seamlessly text, call, video chat, and play games, all in one group chat.

WHEREVER YOU GAME, HANG OUT HERE
‚àô On your PC, phone, or console, you can still hang out on Discord. Easily switch between devices and use tools to manage multiple group chats with friends.

scraped_reviews.content: Works pretty well for a chat app, however the mobile version of discord has been having issues in past month, including microphone not working on calls (aux, Bluetooth and built-in), calls self-ending, and other smaller things. Edit: as of 2025 there are still major issues, sometimes requiring you to leave and rejoin a call to hear each other, calls hanging up and then calling the person back automatically, along with being very resource intensive. Too many problems to justify.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you're encountering microphone issues or call disruptions, try restarting your device, reinstall the app, and ensure both your OS and app are updated. You can find more troubleshooting tips here: https://dis.gd/mobile-voice-help

title: Math Kids: Math Games For Kids
description:
It's never too early to start your child's education. Preschoolers, kindergarteners, toddlers, and older kids are eager to learn their ABCs, counting, addition, subtraction, and more! The best way to encourage that is to share smart, well-made educational apps and games with them on a daily basis.

Math Kids is a free learning game designed to teach young children numbers and mathematics. It features several mini-games that toddlers and pre-K kids will love to play, and the more they do the better their math skills will become! Math Kids will help preschoolers, kindergarteners, 1st graders to learn to identify numbers and start training with addition and subtraction puzzles. They'll have a great time completing games and earning stickers, and you‚Äòll have a great time watching them grow and learn.

Math Kids features a number of puzzles that teach while your child plays, including:
‚Ä¢ Counting - Learn to count objects in this simple game of addition.
‚Ä¢ Compare - Children can build their counting and comparing skills to see which group of items is bigger or smaller.
‚Ä¢ Adding Puzzle - A fun mini-game where kids create math problems by dragging numbers on the screen.
‚Ä¢ Adding Fun - Count the objects and tap on the missing number.
‚Ä¢ Adding Quiz - Put your child's math and addition skills to the test.
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Puzzle - Fill in the missing symbols in the math problem.
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Fun - Count the items to solve the puzzle!
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.

When kids can play while they're learning, they're much more likely to recall information. It also makes them want to learn more frequently, which will give them a huge boost when they start kindergarten.

Math Kids also comes with a number of features that help adults monitor and manage their child's progress. Customize game modes to increase or decrease the difficulty, or check report cards to see scores for previous rounds.

Math Kids is the perfect introduction to the basics of counting, addition, and subtraction. It will teach your toddler, kindergartener, 1st grader sorting, and logical skills along with early mathematics, giving them the perfect foundation for a lifetime of learning.

Note to Parents:
When creating Math Kids, we focused on building the best possible learning experience for children of all ages. We're parents ourselves, so we know exactly what makes a good educational game, as well as what doesn't. We released Kids Math as a completely free game with no in-app purchases or third party ads. Math Kids is full featured, frustration free, and ready to go. It‚Äôs exactly the kind of educational app we want for our children, and we think your family will enjoy it, too!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

It's never too early to start your child's education. Preschoolers, kindergarteners, toddlers, and older kids are eager to learn their ABCs, counting, addition, subtraction, and more! The best way to encourage that is to share smart, well-made educational apps and games with them on a daily basis.

Math Kids is a free learning game designed to teach young children numbers and mathematics. It features several mini-games that toddlers and pre-K kids will love to play, and the more they do the better their math skills will become! Math Kids will help preschoolers, kindergarteners, 1st graders to learn to identify numbers and start training with addition and subtraction puzzles. They'll have a great time completing games and earning stickers, and you‚Äòll have a great time watching them grow and learn.

Math Kids features a number of puzzles that teach while your child plays, including:
‚Ä¢ Counting - Learn to count objects in this simple game of addition.
‚Ä¢ Compare - Children can build their counting and comparing skills to see which group of items is bigger or smaller.
‚Ä¢ Adding Puzzle - A fun mini-game where kids create math problems by dragging numbers on the screen.
‚Ä¢ Adding Fun - Count the objects and tap on the missing number.
‚Ä¢ Adding Quiz - Put your child's math and addition skills to the test.
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Puzzle - Fill in the missing symbols in the math problem.
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Fun - Count the items to solve the puzzle!
‚Ä¢ Subtracting Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.

When kids can play while they're learning, they're much more likely to recall information. It also makes them want to learn more frequently, which will give them a huge boost when they start kindergarten.

Math Kids also comes with a number of features that help adults monitor and manage their child's progress. Customize game modes to increase or decrease the difficulty, or check report cards to see scores for previous rounds.

Math Kids is the perfect introduction to the basics of counting, addition, and subtraction. It will teach your toddler, kindergartener, 1st grader sorting, and logical skills along with early mathematics, giving them the perfect foundation for a lifetime of learning.

Note to Parents:
When creating Math Kids, we focused on building the best possible learning experience for children of all ages. We're parents ourselves, so we know exactly what makes a good educational game, as well as what doesn't. We released Kids Math as a completely free game with no in-app purchases or third party ads. Math Kids is full featured, frustration free, and ready to go. It‚Äôs exactly the kind of educational app we want for our children, and we think your family will enjoy it, too!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

title: Art Puzzle - Jigsaw Art Games
description:
Welcome to Art Puzzle - a special type of art games that offers you the ultimate aesthetic experience. It is a unique puzzle game where relaxing coloring meets jigsaw puzzles. This picture puzzle game is designed to help players calm down and relax while exploring beautiful landscapes and admiring dreamy images. Try this refreshing reimagination of art games and jigsaw puzzles for free!

In Art Puzzle, you will enjoy attractive hidden pictures that come to life as you attempt to guess the silhouettes of objects, fit all the pieces of jigsaw puzzle into the right places and win relaxing art game. These calming puzzle games are an exciting experience that have completely revamped the traditional concepts of jigsaw puzzles, offering help to those seeking a soothing escape.

This jigsaw puzzle app is a super relaxing and aesthetically breathtaking kind of free art games. Once you begin this fantastic jigsaw puzzle game, you will not be able to stop playing. Say farewell to boredom and stress with these challenging jigsaw puzzles because there are countless pictures for you to color; every single painting is aesthetically stunning and ingeniously conceptualized specifically for this relaxing art games mixed with jigsaw puzzles, offering much-needed help to relax.

If you like to play relaxing and stress-relief jigsaw puzzle games for free, you will definitely love our aesthetic silhouette app! In Art Puzzle you need to find the right place for each jigsaw puzzle piece. As a result, you will win calming art games and bring beautiful stories to life.

Our anti-stress puzzles include a large number of satisfying stories. Every jigsaw puzzle picture has been specially created for this art game. Each picture puzzle is a unique multilayered artwork. Many different artists have created fascinating paintings in which you can immerse yourself especially for these free art games. All art pictures are hand-drawn with original styles and techniques to make these aesthetic jigsaw puzzle games even more unique.

Calming and relaxing Art Puzzle will give you an opportunity to take a break and enliven your daily routine with original jigsaw puzzles for free. At first sight, you may think that this kind of picture puzzle games is quite simple. However, some spots are hidden from your eyes, so be ready for a challenge. We have created a simple but challenging tiles matching mechanic to help enhance your gaming experience and to make these free art games even more interesting. Relax and enjoy jigsaw puzzle games, anytime and anywhere!

Discover Art Puzzle games for free:

* Peaceful jigsaw puzzle games with an entirely unique gaming experience.
* A perfect fusion of two popular genres - art coloring and jigsaw puzzles.
* Solve free jigsaw puzzles, complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies.
* Join Seasonal Events, enjoy challenging jigsaw puzzle games and get unique animated postcards.
* Anti-stress jigsaw puzzle games with fascinating hand-drawn art content from different artists and art masters, each with their own original style and technique.
* Stunning pictures that come to life when you complete these calming jigsaw puzzles.
* Helpful hints to guide you when you get stuck solving jigsaw puzzles.

Dive into a whole new world of relaxing art games for free and feel the enchanting visual magic of color jigsaw puzzle! Chill and relax with Art Puzzle.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to completely enjoy this game. every time I get a new phone and have to start over again, the game changes. now, instead of finding shapes to fill in, it's ortions of shapes. and, sometimes the only clue is a small squiggly of a line. the rating system is unnecessary and inaccurate. I can struggle, and get 3 stars, and be flawless and receive 2 or 1. May consider uninstalling after this many years, because it is no longer fun. thanks for when it was fun.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for the feedback. Please note that you can transfer the progress from one device to another: for this, please activate the Back Up Progress option in the settings of the app on both devices and make sure you're using the same Google account. Feel free to contact us at support@easybrain.com if you have any questions.

scraped_reviews.content: The game is fun and all, but it's bloated and slows down because of processing all the ads. I just uninstalled because I got FOUR ads in the middle of a single puzzle, and then had a 30+ second unskippable ad at the end. I get the need to fund development, and I absolutely support that, but this is far too many. I'm going back to one of the several games that have ZERO ads in them, or just banners at the top or bottom.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry ads bother you. After 5 seconds since the beginning of a video ad, there must appear an option to skip the ad: a fast forward or a cross-shaped button. If there's no such button, please contact us via the "Help" in the app with a screenshot of the problem ad. We'll be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I was drawn in the story but the story was dropped later on for random places and people puzzles. I want to know if she found the buried treasure! Also, there are a ton of ads, which wouldn't be so bad if they didn't interrupt game play so frequently. Finally, this is not exactly the game mechanics I enjoy. For example, I have 10 pieces, but the picture requires that I put down 4 specific pieces down first even though I know where that other piece goes. Very unsatisfying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed the story! We appreciate your feedback about the gameplay and ad interruptions. A smooth experience is essential, and your insights on game mechanics are invaluable to us. We hope you keep finding joy in the game!

scraped_reviews.content: this app is really fun and relaxing except for the ads. they are insane. I will watch all the ads if you give me a reward for it but being forced to watch an ad for no reason every minute makes this app terrible. especially when it's after a "good job" it's like my reward for doing a good job is being forced to waste up to a minute of my life and it takes away from the fun and relaxing feel of the game. if this wasn't an issue I'd give it 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! It's wonderful to know you're enjoying the fun and relaxing aspects of the game! We truly appreciate your feedback about the frequency of ads. We recognize how disruptive they can be, especially after completing a task. Your thoughts matter to us, and we hope you continue to find joy in the game despite this concern!

scraped_reviews.content: Deleting. Used to be fun but now it's just weird. I agree with the other reviews regarding not being able to see the outlines for some pieces and it's annoying having pieces overlap, but I'm also deleting because the puzzles are getting strange and demonic. The puzzles started being centered around witchcraft, voodoo dolls, potions, and weird looking dreams/characters. Just not my vibe and definitely not what's advertised (the woman in the cold with the baby).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate your feedback and recognize your concerns about the puzzle themes and the visibility of pieces. It's disheartening to hear the changes haven't aligned with your expectations. Your insights are important, and we value them as we strive to enhance your experience. Thank you for sharing your thoughts!

scraped_reviews.content: I have loved the app, and I have been playing it for several years. However, I am on the verge of deleting the game. While I love the different tournaments you have now, I am very disappointed with the number of recycled puzzles. Even some of the daily puzzles and secret levels have been previously seen puzzles lately. When will you be publishing new puzzles? I'm getting tired of knowing what the picture is as soon as I see the puzzle pieces.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Seems you've seen some repetitions under the "Mystery" label. The mystery puzzles consist of the old daily and event pictures that a player didn't complete: the ones from the previous months or even years. If you don't have such pictures and have completed all the available daily puzzles, the app will suggest some old regular levels.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm deleting this game. I've noticed that when I try to fit in a puzzle piece it doesn't work. You have to click on an ad and then suddenly it works. It's worse all of the time. Some ads lock up so you are stuck. It's just becoming an ad scam. I've played for a year...sorry to stop but enough with the scams. If you win a tournament, they don't tell you what place. Its very disappointing. I'm out!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback. It's important to note that the app won't disregard any pieces placed correctly and if the outline for a specific piece has been shown on the board. Precise placement is required for smaller details. If you're sure there is a bug, please contact us through the Help section in the app's settings.

scraped_reviews.content: I chose this puzzle art game because it had beautiful pictures, peaceful, lovely to look at while playing the game... and now they are HORRIBLE!! I'm assuming this is what AI does to a game. It RUINS it!! I really enjoyed this game and now the colors are ugly, the pictures all are ugly and look like a severely color blind child drew them. it's just gotten worse and worse. And the pieces that you figure out where they go don't even make sense most of the time. :-(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! It‚Äôs disheartening to hear that the visuals and puzzle quality have not met your expectations. We truly appreciate your love for the game's original beauty, and your feedback is invaluable. Your thoughts will guide us in enhancing the experience. Thank you for sharing your insights!

scraped_reviews.content: Glitches in the game. Lines that highlite where items go are missing. You have to watch a advertisement to get help to find out what lines are missing. The other issue is once you put an item in place the white lines remain sometimes into the next round. some of the lines you have to use some of them you don't so you don't know which ones are new and which ones are old. It makes it impossible to figure out what you're supposed to do. There are way to many advertisements
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry you're experiencing trouble! Could you please share full details of this issue with our team through the Help in the app or at support@easybrain.com? We'll be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: the art is cute and adorable! scraped_reviews.content: Overall, great idea. However, little things ruin what would be a relaxing game. Having multiple ad breaks in a level, for one (I get it, ads keep games free). Said ads not being automatically muted when you have game audio muted is another. Also, being literally forced to watch ads for hints on some levels because there aren't lines for an object (not hard to see - which does happen to, sometimes they literally do not exist). Shame, because this could easily be a 5 star game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Unfortunately, muting the app's sounds won't mute ads - they use the media sound of your device to play sounds. If you wish to mute all the ads, the best solution would be to switch your device to silent mode. If you face the bug with the outlines, please send us a screenshot through the Help section in the app's settings. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This feels like it should be a logic game but the logic aspect is missing. Each puzzle has to be completed in a certain order to unlock the next set of moves, but the order doesn't make sense which forces you to click on ads for hints. For example, it makes sense to fix the wall before hanging pictures. It does not make sense to put up a bookcase before fixing the floor. It's frustrating to know where items go but not being able to put them there because something unrelated isn't built yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We're sorry to hear that the concept of the app didn't resonate with you. The rule of placing parts based on existing outlines is designed to bring a unique level of challenge to the game. We appreciate your feedback and will take it into consideration as we continue to improve the app.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to enjoy this app, but had to reinstall it after a fault on my phone. This latest version of it is rubbish. Having replaced a collection of artful images with some uninteresting and completely not needed storyline looking thing. The app has completely lost its way and forgotten what it is supposed to be. Bring back the original art images and bin this depressing story image nonsense. No one needs a story to introduce play on a puzzle that is totally self-explanatory. Not recommended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback and your feelings regarding the recent app changes. We aim to preserve what made the game enjoyable for you. Your insights on the storyline and art images are valuable, and we will consider them. The storyline appears in the early levels, then transitions back to the familiar random art.

scraped_reviews.content: I QUIT AFTER YEARS OF PLAY. This was my fav game until puzzles of 70-80 dot-size pieces took over this month. Pieces so small a magnifying glass is needed. Outlines not always defined. Also, players who take advantage of ad-free hints (I paid that fee too) & do 100+ puzzles in an hour make tournaments unfair. There should be a hint limit per puzzle. I'm fast but am sure no one can do a puzzle in seconds without cheating. To end my frustrating daily hours of play, I QUIT.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! It‚Äôs disheartening to hear about your departure after enjoying the game for so long. scraped_reviews.content: Found it to be enjoyable and relaxing. Ads didn't bother me because I understand the need for them. But, when the multipage ads began to appear, that spelled the beginning of the end for me. If you click on the X, it didn't end the ad, it took you to another page. This page has another X to end the ad, or so it seems, but no....it reverts to the original page, so you keep going back and forth between pages, to no avail. I have uninstalled Art Puzzle. Woodoku's next if ads aren't reformatted!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry ads bother you. scraped_reviews.content: This started off strongly, a nice mellow & relaxing puzzle game to while away some time. Yes it had ads, but they were short and infrequent. Recently, however, the number of ads has at least doubled, maybe tripled, with more & more lengthy ones thrown into the mix. It's becoming more aggravating than relaxing. Might be time to move on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We genuinely appreciate your honesty. It was never our intention to disappoint you. We will use your feedback to evaluate changes and make improvements to our ads policy.

scraped_reviews.content: False advertising. Ads show a puzzle game where you have to fix up an area to save the person from dying. Idea was do things in right order so they live. I liked that concept. What I got was an idiotic puzzle game where it only lets you do one of a few options, and you MUST do it in a certain order. Know where something goes but it's not highlited? Oh well. Won't let it go there. Not as advertised. Just be honest about your product!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for the detailed feedback. Please note that according to the rules of the game, you can place a detail only if you already have an outline for it. We regret to hear this concept doesn't suit you. üôÅ The ad for the app shows the plot of some levels in the app. However, we'll keep this in mind, thank you! Sorry for misleading you.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the concept, but the puzzles are so repetitive. They're all either quaint villages/houses, kitchens, or cozy rooms with book shelves. I would love to see more variety in the puzzles themselves! The app itself is great, though, and I'd give it 5 stars if there was more variety.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please drop a note to support@easybrain.com and include any suggestions you have for improvement! It's our goal to make the service better so your suggestions will be a great help! Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: So I read the reviews before I tried this game. I did notice that there were ads. I gave it a chance regardless. You do get an ad everytime you finish a puzzle. If there was a way to reduce the amount of ads that would be appreciated. We realize that game company needs to make $$. Reduce the ads!!! Overall, up graphics. What prizes?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry ads bother you. scraped_reviews.content: Thoroughly enjoyed this game until my last update. Now there's just way too many ads! I mean it's a truly ridiculous amount. You can't even have time to enjoy the game anymore...Gees...

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoyed it until I got to the blackout puzzles. scraped_reviews.content: Here's the thing. A few years ago I would have given this 5 stars. They had fairly uninvasive ads between levels and it was a relaxing puzzle game. Now I get ads for it on other games constantly- showing gameplay I know is not at all in the game with the same format as those other cheap click bait ads. I won't support false advertising.

scraped_reviews.content: A surprisingly enjoyable little "puzzle" game. It's less a puzzle and more like a sticker game? That said, there are a LOT of ads (basically one per puzzle). There are lots of images. A very chill and relaxing game.

This is a lovely game. I've done 900 puzzles and enjoyed it a lot, but I'm done. There are just too many ads. One at the beginning of the puzzle, another at the end. One should be enough. But depending on how many segments the puzzle is devided up into there will be 1 to 3 more ads! If you are listening to anything, every ad cuts your audio. The constant interruptions are too much.

Just show the actual gameplay and you'll get players that actually WANT to play the game. These kind of back handed ploys only serve to annoy the players. scraped_reviews.content: I am really enjoying this puzzle game. It is a bit different than your typical jigsaw puzzles and I like it. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're thrilled to hear you find the game cute! Your interest in a story mode is noted, and we plan to add more puzzles with a story in future updates. However, most levels will continue to be regular puzzles without a plot. Please contact us through the Help section in the app's settings regarding the issue with pieces.

title: edX online learning
description: Meet the online learning platform that prepares you for every career moment. Register for free to discover: - Options for every budget, from free courses to professional certificates to full degrees. - World-class content partners like MIT, Harvard, Amazon, and Google. - Upskilling opportunities in critical disciplines like AI, supply chain, and sustainability. It‚Äôs never too late or too early to join edX. Our courses and programs meet you where you are in your professional trajectory. You can: - Switch industries. Launch, change, or advance your tech career with immersive boot camps. - Strengthen your r√©sum√©. Deepen your expertise and showcase your skills with professional certificate programs. - Level up as a leader. Learn to lead initiatives and teams with executive education programs. - Earn a degree. Unlock new career opportunities with master‚Äôs, doctorate, and undergraduate degree programs. Make your next career move on your schedule. With edX‚Äôs free mobile app, you can: - Stream online courses in AI, cybersecurity, data science, and more. - Download course materials and transcripts for uninterrupted access. - Test your knowledge with quizzes, assignments, and exams. - Discover and enroll in new courses and programs as your skills evolve. Ready to get started? So are we. Download the app and register for free in minutes. Visit: edx.org Like: facebook.com/edx Follow: x.com/edxonline and instagram.com/edxonline

- Options for every budget, from free courses to professional certificates to full degrees.
- World-class content partners like MIT, Harvard, Amazon, and Google.
- Upskilling opportunities in critical disciplines like AI, supply chain, and sustainability.

It‚Äôs never too late or too early to join edX. Our courses and programs meet you where you are in your professional trajectory. You can:

- Switch industries. Launch, change, or advance your tech career with immersive boot camps.
- Strengthen your r√©sum√©. Deepen your expertise and showcase your skills with professional certificate programs.
