scraped_reviews.content: Very frustrated. Booked trip, it put hold on my credit card. No confirmation. I tried to use help option, can't use it unless you have booking. You can charge my card but can't confirm reservation? I dig further for help & find that because the flight is with a budget airline I need to contact airline directly. I did and 4 HOURS later they still couldn't find anything and told me it's not their issue I will have to go back to hopper. REALLY? I used skiplagged instead. No problems.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience, we certainly do not want our users to feel frustrated. If you require further assistance, please DM us via Twitter @HopperSupport or via Facebook Messenger. Our Team would be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I spent almost 400 dollars and the hotel NEVER got my reservation. You can't talk to a live person unless you pay more. When sending emails you can't get a timely response without paying more and when you go to take thier offers you pay extra as well. I was initially told I could pay when I get to the hotel. NOPE, took it out of my account right away. Said it was refundable and NOPE on that too. They had asked me how my experience was with a representative, never talked to that person. SCAMMED!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that your experience with Hopper was less than satisfactory and frustrating. This is certainly not the experience we wish for our users to have. We have reached out to our Hotel team to assist you with your concern. Please wait for their response.

scraped_reviews.content: DON'T BOOK FLIGHTS THROUGH THIS APP. My flight was cancelled in March due to the pandemic and I was told initially by customer service that I could book a new flight using credit. Since then I've tried probably 10 times to contact them over MONTHS and have not gotten a response aside from an automated chat bot. The customer service isn't just awful, it's non-existent. If you want to be able to get a credit or your money refunded on a canceled flight, don't use Hopper.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and for raising this issue. Our Support Team is reviewing your case in more detail and will be in touch as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: You can't get ahold of customer service until after you buy a ticket which isn't helpful when you have questions about their policies and additional services. My booking didn't stick the first time and by the time you find out, my ticket went up in price (couldn't contact customer service then either). I also bought the change anytime service, but again, I wasted money on it because it does not actually mean change anytime. Will be deleting the app after my trip.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We're really sorry to hear that you have decided not to use the app and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Feel free to reach out to us via Twitter or Facebook DM so we can assist you further.

title: Etsy: Shop Home, Style & More
description: Welcome to the Universe of Special. Shop Etsy‚Äîyour global marketplace for original items made, handpicked, and designed by real people for all budgets. Explore everything from vintage treasures and trending style pieces to personalized jewelry and custom home decor. Get offers and deals on one-of-a-kind items from small shops, chat with Etsy sellers, track your orders, and more. Online furniture shopping or gifting for the holidays? No matter what you‚Äôre looking for, Etsy has the pieces that speak to you. Download today and discover original gifts and seasonal treasures from our community of sellers. Shop the Etsy app. App Marketplace Features Global Marketplace ‚Ä¢ Explore over 15+ categories of original items from all over the world‚Äîfrom thrifted clothes to handmade jewelry and home decor. ‚Ä¢ Favorite shops, save items, and organize your pieces in collections for future inspiration. ‚Ä¢ Shop from trusted tastemakers, including the Icon Collection from WNBA All-Stars. ‚Ä¢ Get inspired with the fall and winter trend guide, curated by our marketplace insights and experts. Gift Special with Etsy ‚Ä¢ Create a gift list of your favorite items and save special occasions for helpful reminders. ‚Ä¢ Shopping last minute? Make every gift special with custom gift teasers that give people a sneak peek at their present. Or, send a gift card with a personalised touch! ‚Ä¢ Personalize clothes, decor, and style essentials to make your gifts one-of-a-kind. Save More with the Etsy app ‚Ä¢ Stay updated on offers and deals from small shops with push notifications. ‚Ä¢ Shop curated selections of items on sale from Etsy sellers you love. ‚Ä¢ Explore thrift finds and keep fashion circular, with vintage steals from small shops. Track, Chat & Shop with Ease ‚Ä¢ Chat with Etsy sellers, ask questions, and stay in-the-know on your order status. ‚Ä¢ Read customer reviews for small shops that speak to you. ‚Ä¢ Track gifts and shipments and customize notifications to your taste. ‚Ä¢ Shop safely with secure payments, including credit/debit, Etsy gift cards, Paypal, Klarna, and quick purchases with Google Pay. Buy Global, Support Local ‚Ä¢ Home goods and decor: Find furniture or new prints to style your space, and give the perfect housewarming gifts with pieces like handmade glassware sets or a custom dining table. ‚Ä¢ Original art and collectibles: Pick up finds from around the world, like Turkish pottery and Portuguese ceramics. ‚Ä¢ Clothes, jewelry & accessories: Shop vintage clothing and handmade accessories to elevate your personal wardrobe.* ‚Ä¢ DIY ideas: Get all the supplies and craft kits you need to throw a themed party or learn a new hobby. Enjoy shopping with a personalized touch in the Etsy app. Discover something special for every occasion from a global community of talented sellers‚Äîfrom clothing and furniture to art, decor, and more. Download today. *Etsy does not evaluate vintage items‚Äô condition and authenticity.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Universe of Special.

Shop Etsy‚Äîyour global marketplace for original items made, handpicked, and designed by real people for all budgets. Explore everything from vintage treasures and trending style pieces to personalized jewelry and custom home decor. Get offers and deals on one-of-a-kind items from small shops, chat with Etsy sellers, track your orders, and more.

Online furniture shopping or gifting for the holidays? No matter what you‚Äôre looking for, Etsy has the pieces that speak to you. Download today and discover original gifts and seasonal treasures from our community of sellers.

Shop the Etsy app.

App Marketplace Features

Global Marketplace
‚Ä¢ Explore over 15+ categories of original items from all over the world‚Äîfrom thrifted clothes to handmade jewelry and home decor.
‚Ä¢ Favorite shops, save items, and organize your pieces in collections for future inspiration.
‚Ä¢ Shop from trusted tastemakers, including the Icon Collection from WNBA All-Stars.
‚Ä¢ Get inspired with the fall and winter trend guide, curated by our marketplace insights and experts.

Gift Special with Etsy
‚Ä¢ Create a gift list of your favorite items and save special occasions for helpful reminders.
‚Ä¢ Shopping last minute? Make every gift special with custom gift teasers that give people a sneak peek at their present. Or, send a gift card with a personalised touch!
‚Ä¢ Personalize clothes, decor, and style essentials to make your gifts one-of-a-kind.

Save More with the Etsy app
‚Ä¢ Stay updated on offers and deals from small shops with push notifications.
‚Ä¢ Shop curated selections of items on sale from Etsy sellers you love.
‚Ä¢ Explore thrift finds and keep fashion circular, with vintage steals from small shops.

Track, Chat & Shop with Ease
‚Ä¢ Chat with Etsy sellers, ask questions, and stay in-the-know on your order status.
‚Ä¢ Read customer reviews for small shops that speak to you.
‚Ä¢ Track gifts and shipments and customize notifications to your taste.
‚Ä¢ Shop safely with secure payments, including credit/debit, Etsy gift cards, Paypal, Klarna, and quick purchases with Google Pay.

Buy Global, Support Local
‚Ä¢ Home goods and decor: Find furniture or new prints to style your space, and give the perfect housewarming gifts with pieces like handmade glassware sets or a custom dining table.
‚Ä¢ Original art and collectibles: Pick up finds from around the world, like Turkish pottery and Portuguese ceramics.
‚Ä¢ Clothes, jewelry & accessories: Shop vintage clothing and handmade accessories to elevate your personal wardrobe.*
‚Ä¢ DIY ideas: Get all the supplies and craft kits you need to throw a themed party or learn a new hobby.

Enjoy shopping with a personalized touch in the Etsy app. Discover something special for every occasion from a global community of talented sellers‚Äîfrom clothing and furniture to art, decor, and more. Download today.

*Etsy does not evaluate vintage items‚Äô condition and authenticity.
summary: Shop home goods, vintage treasures, art prints & more with Etsy. Download today!

scraped_reviews.content: I would use Etsy a ton more if there weren't shipping fees. Two, 2.5" button pins shouldn't cost over $5 in shipping alone. And stickers shouldn't even have shipping fees at all. I don't even know why I try anymore, I'll look at things then add them to my cart and go to purchase, then immediately delete them because of shipping. a $6 order just turned into $12 so I deleted it and ordered something similar from elsewhere.(10pc pins for $10 and free shipping).

This app would be so much better if they would implement the most obvious feature-the ability to DOWNLOAD FROM THE APP. It's not rocket science. It's especially annoying when you go to use the browser, and it only shows you about 3 purchases at a time, and every page asks you to open the app. ü§¨ I buy patterns and digital files 99% of the time. I'm not sure why they still won't make this happen!

I absolutely love this site and what the vendors offer, especially because most of them put their hard work and beautiful craftsmanship into every piece. You do have to be careful when ordering, the shipping costs aren't listed until checkout and the taxes are absolutely insane! you can scroll down and have it calculate your shipping costs, change your filters to only show sellers with free shipping (however the cost of goods tend to be higher to make up for it), or you can filter out countries

I love Etsy, but the shipping is expensive, just bought a simple sticker and they charge over $4.00 for shipping. It was more than the sticker! But I can't find it anywhere else and I needed it. Why not just a stamp? It would fit in a basic envelope! I don't buy alot just because of the shipping costs. But they have amazing sellers and items! I love the uniqueness of the items! Just the shipping costs makes it frustrating.

In process of deleting my account and the app. 1) Their shipping fees are very expensive. Not to mention, their sellers barely get a profit. Honestly, I wouldn't be surprised if the two were connected. 2) Sellers buying bulk to make a profit. One of my favorite sellers has a lower customer count than one selling bootleg t shirts. There needs to be a serious background check. I would not be surprised if Etsy deletes my review. But just in case I'll screenshot it.

I don't use Etsy a lot (probably 10 times total) but the few times I have, I NEVER receive my orders without reaching out to the seller well after the supposed delivery date. I always give them extra time because I understand things happen. This is not an isolated incident, it's every time. Once I even had to reach out to Etsy as a whole because the seller flat out ignored me. I also see things being sold on here for upward of $30+ that I've seen sold at Dollar General for $4.00. Ridiculous!

I like the crochet patterns they have. But the app is so confusing. You make your purchases through the app. But the instant download can't be downloaded from the app. It is supposed to be available to download from the email receipt they send to you. But on each and every pattern I have had problems downloading. When you open the app, it goes straight to sells. Not your account. And going to your purchases and reviews is total confusion. I like the patterns, but it's almost not worth it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We‚Äôre noting your experience and will share it with our team to consider for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: There used to be a feature, where you could see all the shops you followed, and they would show you the most recent items for those shops in one area. They took that away? Why? To make it harder than it already is to find what you want to buy? Combined with the fact that the search is the worst (sort by recent? Doesn't work. Search key words? Etsy throws in 100s of unrelated results) and the app is just this awful garbage that shows you stuff you don't want to see.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there is anything specific we can look into, please contact us at https://rb.gy/pucp3f.

scraped_reviews.content: The app wouldn't let me apply my 40% off code, I tried 3 times. On the 3rd try, I clicked the enter key, and instead of trying to apply the code, it sent my purchase through. I've spent the last 20 minutes trying to contact customer support, but when I click "contact customer support" I keep getting rerouted to the "contact the seller" page. I am furious & will be deleting the app and not using the site in the future.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we appreciate your 1 star review and feedback on using the Etsy app and services. We apologize for any inconvenience this might have brought you. Please contact our support team through our help center support page (https://etsy.me/2qTLHnO) if there's anything else we can help you with and we'll respond as immediate as possible. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This was my first time using the app, and honestly, I'm extremely dissatisfied with it. It's difficult to search for starters, and the "helpers" don't respond often enough/can't type in English apparently. I placed an or that was supposed to arrive by the end of December, and it's now mid-January. I got a message this morning saying there was an error while making my order, and it would be an extra 10 days before it ships. Now it says shipped on the same day but no tracking info. 1/10 rated app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we appreciate your 1 star review and feedback on using the Etsy app and services. We apologize for any inconvenience this might have brought you. Please contact our support team through our help center support page (https://etsy.me/2qTLHnO) if there's anything else we can help you with and we'll respond as immediate as possible. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Everytime this app is updated it creates a million problems I wish they would just leave it alone. Once again there's a bunch of issues after updating. My saved folders are all rearranged, items have disappeared from my sorted folders. I have hundreds of saved items in each folder and after scrolling through maybe 40, the items just keep repeating forever instead of showing me the other things I have in said folder. Also, after so many items it shows Everything to be sold out even when it's not.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for your bad experience. Could you please update the application. The older version has some issues that we have fixed. If you still face any issues, please contact us at https://rb.gy/pucp3f.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is fine but I wish they had a way to REMOVE a material from search results. As someone with skin sensitivities it's really frustrating that no matter what combination of search results I try; Sterling Silver will always show up. Even if I have the search results only for obscure non-metal options. Also the platform has definitely been taken over by AI brands that are just taking more rip-off amazon products and heat pressing them onto tee-shirts, and that goes completely unchecked.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there is anything specific we can look into, please contact us at https://rb.gy/pucp3f.

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is easy enough to use and navigate the problem I've noticed as the ETSY store grows as the app seems to suggest more and more of exactly the same item you are already looking at. Basically finding the item you are looking for is pretty easy if you know ahead of time exactly what you are looking for but if you are browsing for general ideas or gift the related item suggestions are pretty poor and make for a frustrating experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre sorry to learn that you‚Äôre dissatisfied. We want to address your concerns and improve. Please reach out to us at https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013375488 so we can assist you

scraped_reviews.content: I recently re-signed in, and was astounded by screens pushing me to pay for a subscription in order to shop on Etsy! There was no "No thanks" option, making it seem like it was required in order to shop on Etsy! I was able to back out of it with back button. But both of these actions by Etsy were very offensive! First, pushing people to pay for the privilege of shopping on the app... Then, not having an obvious or easy way to NOT do so, which is highly manipulative AND deceptive! Bad move, Etsy!

The change to "ships from" is infuriating. I want to support local shops but now it shows the entire United States and that's it. Etsy was my go-to for ALL my gifts. I used to buy from Etsy pretty frequently, but I haven't bought a SINGLE thing since this idiotic change. I want stores that help support my local economy and reduce pollution from shipping. Even if you don't have States as a drop-down menu, at the very LEAST allow the option for users to type in the locations themselves.

overrun with AI garbage and they let it happen. People are being scammed left and right by AI listings and Etsy lets it happen because it's money for them. I have over 10k sales on Etsy, but I might be switching platforms because I'm sick of it. there needs to be a "I don't want to see this product" option with a drop down menu to select the reason why.

A lot of what I look for on Etsy are patterns and other things that are digital downloads. BUT in the app you can't download your purchased downloads, you have to go the Etsy browser site or dig into email. The REALLY annoying thing, is if you go to the browser website and tap on your purchases, it immediately opens it on the app. ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è You can long press the purchases and open on a new tab and download from there. but that's more work. so the app causes more work for me overall.

love it. more than i expected üòÖ i had bought a specific item a year ago for a gift but hadn't shopped for myself until recently. and now I'm getting hooked. I love the seemingly endless variety of unique items. speciality , artistic , handmade , personalized , you name it you got it. I'm currently using a retro üåà case for my s23. i love it. and prices are very reasonable considering such awesomeness. highly recommend üëå

Is there a way to see honest prices when browsing? Each time I search, I see what appear to be great prices, but when I look to add it to my cart, the cost displayed was a lie. The true cost is triple (at minimum) the displayed amount. Truthfully, because of this constant issue, I have sought my gifts and decor from other vendors who are at least honest with what I can expect to pay for their products and services. I would love to learn of similar platforms with better business practices.

With the latest update to the app, pictures no longer load properly and are tiny. You can't even zoom in to see details because they are so low quality. And if you scroll through photos and then click on them to enlarge it starts back over at the first picture instead of the picture you clicked. Update: after downloading the even newer update since yesterday, I can't even log in to my account, so the app is useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear that. Do share the screenshot of the error page at https://rb.gy/pucp3f to enable us to assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: not an intuitive app. annoying enough that I'm coming to leave you a review. when you order multiple things it gets confusing. for instance if you are In a chat with a vendor you don't have a link anywhere to access your orders from them so something's you're not sure who you're talking to for what item. if you order one thing at a time it wouldn't be an issue. but when it's aot it's not good. the UI needs a serious revamp.

Even though it's a great place to shop with loads of unique items, the prices are deceptive from what is under the photo. When I find an item that I am interested in purchasing, I use the scroll down bar menu and the prices increase and with shipping prices and tax added to that, it makes the items I want too expensive for my budget.

The app lies about the shipping being free until the last page of the order process! In the cart screen it clear states "FREE SHIPPING" then when you get to the final screen where you hit confirm purchase the shipping suddenly jumps up $30+! I don't mind a shipping fee, but don't blatantly lie, then try to sneak it in at the last second!

Worst site ever I was trying to buy a rare item for a friend and when I created an account and tried to purchase it my order got canceled and my account got suspended. I also tried as a guest it kept saying it couldn't verify my cards I used three different ones. Good luck getting a response from support now the item I was trying to purchase is no longer available.

I love it, I've bought from many on here without a regret in the world. If you love buying from hobbyists or are looking for things you can't just find at the store, there are tons of shops and tons of people who might just have what you're looking for. The app itself works wonderfully for me as well, my only exception is that the review page doesn't always work for me. When I go to leave a review it glitches on me and I can't submit it now and again. Otherwise, I love Etsy and its app!

clunky and not typically functioning properly: The app is full of problems that the website does not have but then there are problems the web cannot have as there is no access to certain things from the site but then the app never functions properly for anyway. For instance the tracking is always a problem, which is a major problem is you cannot see the tracking at all....

Etsy, at once time I'm sure was great. it is now just foreign sellers, selling things they mass produce. I've ordered numerous products that show up late, and from other countries even though the due dates show sooner and ship from United states. Etsy has lost the hand crafted it always was. The products are great for ideas but just buy it on Amazon if you can. you'll get better customer service there.

Who wrote this description for this app? You want too many notifications to buy buy buy? Then you'll love this app. Possibly the WORST search engine ever. Even trying to search w/ photos bring back very irrelevant results. I only use Etsy to "window shop" now since it's difficult to find what I'm looking for. The biggest disappointment? NO OPTION TO SHOP HANDMADE. Sadly, you can find better prices on Temu due to a lot of Etsy shops reselling premade items. Cheers to another sellout company.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. We would appreciate it if you could contact us using this link: etsy.me/contactsupport and provide specific issues that we can check on further. Rest assured that we'll assist you right away! Thank you, and stay safe!

scraped_reviews.content: the app works as intended, loads well and easy to navigate. I love etsy, although I wish they would crack down on the shops that send you things from temu. if I wanted temu stuff, I'd go there. but part of the appeal of etsy for me is supporting small businesses/sellers and it sucks having to scroll through all the drop shippers. üëéüèª plus they add a huge mark up.

ever since the update my search results are even more flooded with shops that use AI generated images for their "products" and less of what I'm looking for. I use Etsy for handmade and vintage items and it's starting to look like Amazon. The new single column for search results is awful, please bring back grid viewing or let us choose it as an option.

Etsy has become less for handmade goods and more like a second Amazon. It's very common for drop shippers to list things as handmade items and charge extra for it. I have to be extra careful when buying things to make sure that I can trace the seller to different locations on the internet to prove that they actually make their products. At this point I just find someone on Etsy and I go to their personal website, if they have one, and order from there.

The most recent update has made browsing obnoxious. The listings are huge and are no longer in a grid format. Prior to this update (& something that hasn't been fixed), is that for the items in my shopping cart, they all mistakenly say free shipping. It is only when checking out for each store that I can see the actual shipping cost. I've also noticed that for listings, sometimes the shipping rate is shown immediately below the images and other times I need to scroll further down. Inconsistent.

I love this app. It's where I get a majority of my patterns. I just wish it was easier on the sellers. They get bad reviews because people think (or pretend) that they're ordering a physical product. When checking out, it always asks me to verify the address where I want it to be shipped. Ordering a digital item should trigger it to confirm an email address for shipping instead. I don't know how easy that would be to do, but it would save pattern sellers a lot of headaches.

I searched for a particular type of ring - only found 20-ish options to choose from. After buying one of them, suddenly there are 20-ish more/different options in my feed? Why couldn't I search for these before? The words in the title of the new results match what I was searching for previously! So stupid. Everything else about Etsy is nice.

Edit: Thanks for improving some features. Sometimes the cart and the favorite pages don't load or take a very long time. Recently, they changed the search feature and page. Before, multiple items would be up for view in one row. Which made it easier to see/compare differences between the items side by side. It also allowed for quick viewing, with less scrolling. Now, there's one big window per row. Atleast give options to customize! Why make it worse & archaic?

Extremely Frustrating 95% Of The Time Sellers don't respond to your messages. Messaged 8 Sellers on items bought or questions, almost all no answer replies. "Favorites"/"Shops" not showing up. "Notifications" isn't on the app. "Profile" button Is To Small. Didn't know other areas/sections were under that small Profile button. Needs to be Larger. Accidentally found Those Sections inside the Profile button. Needs a "Recently Viewed" section, would be very great. To show all that was looked at.

I'm not a big fan of how Etsy has implemented an advertising fee that sellers can't opt out of, so whenever I see an Etsy ad on social media, I'll go out of my way to search for the product myself instead of clicking through the ad, as a way around the charges to sellers. After downloading the app's most recent update I have noticed that I'm not able to directly search for things specifically in the app right after I see ads for them. Interesting! Looks like I'll be using the website from now on

this app is horrible. they make you download the app in order to track purchases, but half the time the tracking doesn't work. there's no descriptions on things without clicking on it directly. when going back to the previous page, it doesn't take you back to where you were. so you're left scrolling and searching just to find your spot every time all over again. I love Etsy. but this is seriously worst app ever!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reporting this.To best look into this, can you please open a ticket with our support team? They‚Äôll be able to gather more information and share with our engineering teams. You can contact us here: https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: I have noticed that some items are listed with free shipping, but I am being charged for shipping during checkout. Additionally, in certain cases, the advertised shipping costs are significantly higher at checkout than initially indicated. This inconsistency is concerning and has resulted in unexpected additional charges. Also, I am no longer able to see the applicable sales tax for each order, nor is the shipping cost itemized per shop. Completely unacceptable! What are you hiding?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reaching out, Eva Smillie! We are sorry to hear that you're having issues with the app related to sign-in issues. We invite you to contact us here: etsy.me/contactsupport with your account details. We‚Äôll work with you to resolve this issue quickly and mention that this is an app feedback follow-up.

scraped_reviews.content: It was too hard to get to my order. I had to verify I was a human for over 20 minutes clicking on buses, bicycles, crosswalks, & motorcycles! IT SUCKS!!!!! BY THE TIME I got to my order I didn't care anymore and removed most items. The system doesn't show where the shipping costs are. It shows some shipping costs and others are hidden which seems unacceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We‚Äôre noting your experience and will share it with our team to consider for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: I do NOT need a reminder email an hour after I viewed a product. Didn't even add to cart. And I definitely don't need 2 of them for the exact same product sent within an hour of each other. I am getting sick of having to unsubscribe from emails Etsy sends for stupid reasons. I'd rather use the website at this point instead of having an app that is causing me to reconsider buying from you every time I get one. No, I won't be contacting support. Don't bother asking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at https://rb.gy/pucp3f so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: Etsy sucks. I'm sure most sellers are fine people though. I first tried to use the website to search for some things. I would get access denied prompts for no reason. How frustrating! I kept at it and even tried to sign up and pay for the goods I wanted. For days I was access denied, page not loading, and even my brand new account was locked. I just tried to track my package and was forced to download the app just to do so. Probably won't use Etsy again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. We would appreciate it if you could contact us using this link: https://rb.gy/pucp3f and provide specific issues that we can check on further. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely 100% obnoxious. I bought two gifts and marked them as gifts. What does the app do? Completely fill my home screen with even more of that item and absolutely NO WAY of telling it to stop suggesting them. So stupid. Additionally, I have a red badge on my profile icon that will not go away. They're badgering me to write a review I don't feel like writing. I can't clear it and if I try a quick review, they won't allow it unless I actually write it. This is both the app and website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We deeply respect your advice, and we will try to combine your feedback with our R&D, in order to provide better products.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely terrible experience. I made an account and tried to purchase a list of items totaling over $100-proceeded to checkout and finish the order-immediately was blocked from purchasing for no reason at all, I had sufficient funds and everything. So I reached out to customer support who responded within 2 days but proceeded to tell me that I "violated their terms of use." and that I am "permanently banned from using Etsy and good luck in your future endeavors." With no reason why stated. üëé

I spent hours finding things that were so much cheaper than any other place only to get to the check out and have over 200 in shipping costs for a couple little things that weighed less than 1 lb total. The people that I did buy from had discounts and cheap shipping. I will go back to Amazon where I get free shipping on everything. Sorry Etsy I really like so many things here but shipping costs are ridiculous.

Wow has this platform gone downhill to become a different version of Temu. This store is supposed to sell "handmade" items yet the VAST MAJORITY of the sellers are selling the same junk every other seller is selling. The app is a nightmare to use, with the search feature being the most ridiculous. Make a typo in the search? Well be prepared to type the whole thing out again because the app deletes the search if you go to edit it. All the unrelated ads in the results too... What a disappointment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reporting this to us. To best look into this, can you please open a ticket with our support team? They‚Äôll be able to gather more information and pass the relevant information to our engineering teams. You can contact us here: https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: This is because you can't download purchased patterns in the app. It is so hard to get etsy to open in a browser when you have the app. Fix this! EDIT: Your customer service bot says it cannot be done. I don't know what else to tell you. Please make it possible to download digital patterns directly from the app. I don't have a desktop & it's really hard to open the actual website when you have the app on your phone. I should be able to do everything there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at https://rb.gy/pucp3f? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: App makes you take a picture with their camera specifically, you can no longer upload photos, and you can even edit colors on the camera in the app with can make stuff look better than it actually is. the camera itself is very blurry and has trouble focusing making taking photos frustrating, and it also likes to reset my review and have me take a photo and type everything out again when I'm done, which has made me no longer want to leave reviews.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing this feedback. Happy to hear that you find the app good. If you experience some issues in your end, kindly reach our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport and we'll assist you right away! We'd be happy to improve our app based on your suggestions. Thank you and stay safe!

scraped_reviews.content: The website and app are both extremely buggy. There's a glitch for sellers where you can't finish the process to set up your shop, it doesn't load in the last step, and a glitch where you can't proceed to checkout after leaving the checkout for the first time to edit or find more things to buy. The same thing as the seller glitch. The only way around the checkout glitch is to make new accounts and my account was suspended because THEY can't optimize the app. Disgusting and lazy. Waste of time.

app is ok but there are some major features missing. the ability to have tabs would be fantastic, because if you want to click an item to check it out but then go back to the screen you were browsing, you have to scroll all the way back to where you left off. it doesn't automatically scroll you back to where you were. it also does not allow you to hide specific listings or shops. ie if you are terrified of spiders and you are looking through Halloween decor, there is no way to hide spider items

summary: Read unlimited novels, audiobooks, stories & Unlock ebooks, fanfiction and more!

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to give it a chance and like it but between ads every three pages that end up crashing the app half the time, or only getting 9 chapters (with ads during and after) and then you have to wait hours.. and you can't read another story either. it's just not a great option for an avid reader. and who in this economy can afford the no ad prices. I think it would be a good app for a casually reader who just wants the equivalent of 20 pages a day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, advertising is an important part of our sustainable development. We recommend that you accumulate rewards by participating in tasks and other activities to redeem membership services and enjoy ad-free reading. We will also continue to strive to find the optimal balance between advertising and user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, It gives you quite a few ways to always be able to go to the next chapter of your book, even if you don't add money or buy subscription. just watch short videos to unlock next chapters and continue reading . plus they have amazing variety, and ways to turn your count l coins you accumulate in different ways into actual money. just try it, you won't be disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are delighted to receive your positive feedback! Thank you for your recognition of our platform. We will continue to optimize our content and features to make your reading journey even better. We look forward to you discovering more stories you will love!

scraped_reviews.content: absolutely love this app! i used to like it alot more though but after the last update they changed it to only allow you to watch an ad to unlock a chapter but it only allows 12, 11 or 13 chapters per every like 13hrs (i can't remember the exact number lol) but before there was no limit on unlocking chapters for watching ads. I honestly think that was the worst change possible, especially when this could have been voted the 100% best app for reading fantasy romance novels on the play store easy
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are very happy to hear that you like our app. Advertising is an important way to help us maintain operations and provide high-quality content. At the same time, we will continue to explore more reasonable ways to display ads. Please continue to pay attention to our updates. We promise to continue to improve. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I will be deleting my subscription before it runs out this month. you need to keep better track of your so called "authors" and make sure they are updating on a timely basis...which I can guarantee you most aren't. I will be spending my money on Kindle thank you very much it's over half the price,the novels are all finished and there is no grammatical errors,or straying from the plot etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, you must be my loyal reader! The speed of book updates is difficult to control, we can only ask the author to publish the book as soon as possible. You can read all the books by watching ads. If you still need help or rewards, please contact us through "Feedback".

scraped_reviews.content: I have spent countless hours watching videos, reading adds, and playing games to collect points. I read hours everyday but the app never gives me credit for it, I read 50 chapters and only get credit for 5 or 10. then I try to redeem my hard earned points and it says I have to read for 30 minutes for 5 consecutive days! This is BS, If I earn them I should get to use them how I want! this issues need to be fixed NOW!

Overall, I do like the app but chapters being 3 pages is a little short. At times, I watch adds longer than I'm reading. This is supposed to be a free app but now they are now limiting me to 10 chapters :( I used to read for a few hours but now with losing everything, chapter limits , 2x more commercials I'm about done. Either bring back my ability to read as much as I want when I want or I'm done! no more chapter limits. you say you are free, then be free! thanks for your reply, you lost me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, the revenue from advertising is an important support for us to be able to read free novels. We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. If you have specific concerns or suggestions, please feel free to contact our support team (in the app: Me > Customer Support).

scraped_reviews.content: it is completely free but you only get 5-10 pages per "chapter" and then you have to unlock the next set of 5-10 pages with an ad. which is fine, but you only get 10 chapters every 8 hours. so if youre an avid reader its inconvenient. it'd probably be better if they offered the full chapter with each ad. but even then only 10 chapters every 8 hours is extremely slow. and the 10 chapters is across all books. so once you're out of free chapters for the 8 hours that's it you have to wait.

it's not even close to being "100%" free. ads galore and the price to remove ads is ridiculous. then when you try to claim the coins you've earned, it keeps popping up with this $100 "shopping card" that you've won, which strikes me as some kind of scam. I deleted the app once that started popping up. I'm frankly shocked at how high the reviews are for this app.

For the love of everything get rid of the ads or reduce them! Good grief can't get past two pages without an ad before and after! Sometimes one page has an ad before and after! Ugh! I've enjoyed this app and the books however that enjoyment is becoming irritation of not being able to read without CONSTANT interruption! ***Now I've had to uninstall because the app won't let you unlock chapters without doing more than watching an ad. Get over yourself and fix the issues!

The app only works when it wants to. It acts like it's loading all the time. When I have full bars, I have to log out and log back in frequently. It takes subscription payment 8 days before the payment is due. It says you can read for free, but I wasn't able to. It let's you read half the book them you have to get a subscription to finish the book and 19.99 a month isn't worth it. I have an app I pay 8.99 a month for, and it's better. I do have to say the books are good though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Respected user, hello. We apologize for the inconvenience. You can fully read a book without subscribing. The subscription function is only to remove ads. If you think the subscription price is expensive, you can contact our online customer service to see if there are any discounted activities. Thank you for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. The books are good, lots of spicy stories that we love. So many reviews of this app are just people complaining about the ads. Like, how do you guys think they have all the stories free? Any other reading app I have does the gem thing to unlock chapters. This one doesn't. You just play ads, which is free. I take the time when the ad is playing to grab a snack or just stretch my neck&shoulders. The ads are not THAT long or often. You can fr binge all day for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for contacting us and for your continued support and feedback regarding our app and books. We strive to provide the best possible experience for our users and will continue to work hard to meet your expectations.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the idea of reading free books, however this app has way too many ads. Not only do you have to watch an ad for every chapter, but then there's an ad mid-chapter. That is unnecessary and frankly makes me think the app only wants money for that many ads. The chapters are extremely short and from the book I read they are not proofread so there are many errors. Albeit the book The Fates overall was a good story The cost of the app is more than Kindle Unlimited so definitely not worth it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In response to your feedback, we have been conveyed to our product technology department for verification, please send the issue screenshot and User ID to customer service, we will reply you within 24 hours.(Me>Help Center)

scraped_reviews.content: No way to cancel before trial ends! I was trying to cancel my 3 trial before I was charged the annual fee but there is no where to cancel. I've emailed the company and hopefully will get refunded. Ridiculous, as much as I liked the trial and was considering doing a monthly subscription. I won't be doing any of that now. Once I get this all figured out I will be uninstall ingl√©s. So disappointed because I really liked the story I was reading and want to finish it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Generally, you can go directly to your payment platform to make a subscription cancellation and refund request, but if you can't do it on your own, please send your payment receipt as well as your user id to customer service and we will handle it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: The books are good. A lot of spelling errors etc. I was in the middle of reading A Pack of their Own. Waiting on an update when the book was removed from my book shelf. When I placed it back into my bookshelf I have to start reading chapter 1 instead of the last chapter I read. The waiting for new chapters are frustrating. Please fix the issue with books that are being removed from bookshelves.

Way! Way! Way too many ads! I have tried other story.aps and none are nearly this annoying with the ads. To start a chapter you have to watch a long ad. Sometimes you get through the extremely short chapter with just 3 more quick ads, but other times there are one or 2 more long ads. (Plus the ads at the bottom of every page.) Glitches too! I get needing to support the writers, but Once I finish this story "IF I finish this story" I am just going to NOPE! NOPE! NOPE! On out of here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to make you feel this way, we've picked some more quality authors for the sake of our readers, which makes it seem less cheap than a newspaper or pirated book.You can get all the books to read by watching ads . However you are also able to make the subscription which free with ads.If you still need help or bonus ,(Me>Customer Support)

scraped_reviews.content: Yet another glitch! Just when the problems with the ads get fixed, I run into another glitch. Now the quota-free option isn't working. Neither is the bonus unlock. I've already had to clean up my social media timeline because of all the times I shared, trying to get my free unlock. The ads pop up for the bonus chapters, but nothing happens when the ads close. Please get this fixed. It's bad enough that the chapters are only three pages long.

I expect ads if it's "free." But when it says "you can read again in 10 min." and in 10 min. lets you read half a page and then says you can read again in 30 min...that's rubbish. The book I was reading was full of word errors and typos, and pages of fluff. It also tells you to get rewards by watching ads but when you do, it TAKES away from your total instead of adding. Basically click bait or exoensive auto renew which is undoubtedly difficult to cancel. Nope.

Update: Ingame customer service is not useless. They never responded to a ticket I opened on 09/06/2025. I need solutions, not some blah, blah. I read every day for at least an hour, and despite that, it won't let me get my free 3 day premium pass because of reading minimum requirements. They're met. What's the hold up? After every update of your app, something else stops functioning, and I'm getting sick and tired of this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, to further verify your issue and provide a satisfactory solution, please go to the in-app customer support for assistance, where a dedicated person will assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy most of the books I've read, but some of them drone on way too long before the hero and heroine get their HEA. Please make the translation easier to read in English. Even if it takes longer in between chapters, it really needs editing. I also have issues with only getting to read a certain # of chapters per day 4 any and all books on my list. I think we should be able to read the same amount of chapters that we are reading now, but for each of the books on my list.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review. We regret the quality issues you encountered with the books. Our team is working hard to improve content standards. Please report specific book issues through "Feedback." Your feedback is crucial to our improvement efforts. We appreciate your understanding and support.

scraped_reviews.content: overall best app for reading but here recently, way too many ads. then it will stall and I have to close it then open back up for another long ad I just read. getting frustrated. the longer you use the app the more ads they pile on you everytime I watch an ad to unlock chapter it freezes and will not unlock. I have to close completely out and go back in and start over. Now Every time, every chapter. highly annoying!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We will immediately escalate the issue to the product team for follow-up optimization. To resolve the problem more accurately, please click "Feedback" within the app to contact online customer service. We will prepare a small gift for you as a token of our apology. Thank you for your understanding and support.

scraped_reviews.content: waste of time you have to spend more time watching ad's than you can read and it limits the time you're able to read unless you like reading one chapter then one chapter from a different book rinse and repeat personally i couldn't keep track of what I read was from which book. i deleted the app without being able to finish even one book it was very frustrating and disappointing.

too many ads but what is worse is app freezes after watching them a lot of the time. You have to close it and then rewatch the ads. I wound up watching the ads 3 times and still can't proceed. it also stops you from reading for different time limits arbitrarily. The price to read ad free is ridiculous as it's a lot more then kindle unlimited with a small library of completed works.

Update: I still love this app. The problem that I have encountered is when getting to the end of a chapter ( they get shorter , unfortunately ) I watch an ad to continue to the next SHORT chapter , which allows for 13. The app hasn't been letting me watch the ad once I get to 8 or 9. Very frustrating and disappointing. Still a good app with good books just wish it would let me continue reading. Please fix this issue. I use my coins as well

The stories are great! I like that I don't have to buy anything to enjoy them. The only problem is the further you get along into a book, more ads pop up and they are long. Maybe y'all could switch it to where there's one long ad at the end of each chapter instead of between every two pages. If that happened I would give it a five-star rating
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Ad revenue is a vital support for our ability to provide free novel reading. We will carefully record every piece of feedback and will optimize ad display methods and frequency accordingly to create a smoother reading experience for you. Thank you again for your understanding and support.

scraped_reviews.content: I use to enjoy this app alot; but idk what's going on with it now.... I'm more than happy to do the ads but now after the ad, it goes back to next chapter (where I clicked on the ad) & it just keeps loading loading loading... if I hit the back button goes to page I can click on the book again & when I do it's on the watch ad for next chapter. usually does this 2-3 times I'M ON THE 5TH TIME & STILL CAN'T READ NEXT CHAPTER!!! Fix this please!

so far you can easily earn coins and the stories are well written. the above still applies but there are some glitches that need to be worked out with the coins awarding system for like and following pages. It gives me an error but still says I completed the task and didnt award the points. Not major issues because the rest of the way to earn points works with no issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. We have forwarded your issue to our engineers for verification. To pinpoint the problem more accurately, you can contact our online customer service through the "Feedback" function in our app to report your issue to us. We look forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: If the issue is fixed, then I can change my score. The issue is when you select "watch an ad to unlock", the ad proceeds, and when it is done, and you go back to where it says "watch an ad to unlock", the novel flow icon keeps spinning, and you have to exit to stop it and then you have to start the process all over again to watch an ad. Occasionally, you lose the ad when you go back. So if you started on 10 ads, you lose one. I can repeat this issue without much effort.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. The issue you reported has been forwarded to our engineers, who are working hard to resolve it. Please be patient. You can follow our future version updates, or you can click "Feedback" within the app to contact online customer service for further updates on the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: review revised . I attempted to use this app again only to be disappointed even worse. now when you watch ads they not only don't open the chapters or they will jump pages completely and you have to watch videos to go back to read what was missed, but now the chapters refuse to load or flip to the next page. also deleted the books out of my library. it seems this app is forcing you to spend money if you really want to enjoy it this app and the price has doubled! I would never recommend this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, you must be a loyal reader!The speed of book updates is really out of our control, we can only urge authors to write as soon as possibleIf the information in the book completion or serialisation is incorrectly displayed, please send us a screenshot through 'Feedback'.We will have a compensation coin pack for you.

scraped_reviews.content: unless you REALLY like ads and interruptions, pass on this. it's so had that they won't let you keep reading and you have to watch ads to continue. ads about every other page, then they lock you out for up to an hour. yes you can pay to go ad free but it's actually cheaper to just go Amazon unlimited. Be aware. I would just like to finish this one damned book, I've been trying to read for days on end so I can delete this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and understanding. To maintain our free service, we do rely on advertising as a revenue source. However, you can unlock unlimited reading by completing tasks and redeeming membership cards. If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

scraped_reviews.content: I like that it's free but it has way too many ads. Ads after every chapter , and if after the ad, you accidentally hit the back button there will be an ad to go to the previous chapter that you have already read and you will have to watch ads again to go to the new chapter. Some ads force you to interact and I really dislike that. All the stories are almost all the same so that's pretty annoying too. Same genre, same plot, almost identical characters. On the whole waste of time!

So far it's seems pretty awesome, haven't had to pay a dime for coins to read more chapters like most apps. just watch an ad or two per chapter unlock. It even gives you the choice to use your coins for an Amazon gift card instead of ad free time, which I think is pretty awesome. Getting a gift card just for reading books of my choosing is pretty darn cool.

my go to app for reading. usually just need to watch an ad between chapters. no need to purchase coins to read like other apps. it's also easy to collect coins if you want to read ad free. the ads aren't really much of a deterrent though. I don't think I have ever used the coins I have accumulated. it's a pretty simple app for reading without them trying to force money from you to read anything. I have recommended it to friends and family

Family & friends referred me to several other sites, for I do love to read, but it became too much of a chore just to complete a "book", let alone a chapter ... so I continued my search & found Novelflow. Although some "novels" could use a bit more editing than others, there are exceptionally good reads on this site & I've lost count on just how many I've read so far. Also, I enjoy claiming the rewards. I've collected quite the amount of coins. üòä
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your support and positive feedback. We strive to offer a wide range of engaging novels and will continue to enhance our app's features for an even better reading experience.

scraped_reviews.content: The company takes money for monthly subscriptions after having paid a yearly subscription. There is no way to get in contact with anyone on the app. Many books are incomplete. Several have severe grammar & spelling issues. There is no way to submit feedback on any of it. If you try the free reading, you will be overwhelmed with adds & pop-ups.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: From your description, you may have accidentally purchased two subscriptions.Our books are split into ‚ÄúOngoing‚Äù & ‚ÄúCompleted‚Äù, clearly marked in book details for you to choose.We have a professional editorial team & take grammar issues seriously.To resolve these, please reach out to in - app Feedback‚Äîour specialists will assist you directly.Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Five stars went up in ads, in 2026. now it's a solid 1 star. 5!! in chapter ads, one 30s ad on the last page, and then two minute long ads at the start of each chapter? I don't mind swapping ads for free reading. I do mind spending more time watching ads than reading. and more time swiping ads than swiping pages. I absolutely loved this app when it first came out. loved it til this year, tbh. and it's not getting better it's getting worse. if the ads don't tone down, I'm scrapping the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your feedback will be shared with the product team for follow-up optimization. To more accurately resolve the issue and to remedy any inconvenience, please contact our online customer service by clicking "Feedback" in the app. Thank you for your understanding and support, and we look forward to improving your reading experience as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the books but the ads have gotten worse! I tolerated them but now you can only read 13 chapters & most of the chapters are short. I watched ads to get 2 minutes free and still had to watch ads so it wasn't really free. I may just delete the app. There are really great books but I have been stuck on 1 book for 3 months due to the ads. I wouldn't recommend but there aren't other apps with books like these.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback and I'm sorry for the negative experience. If you prefer an ad-free reading experience, you might want to try our membership service, which removes all ads with one click. Alternatively, you can redeem your free coins for our membership experience and enjoy the benefits of membership.

scraped_reviews.content: The ads are a bit excessive, that's why I only gave 4, but game of destiny is definitely so good that I've been reading as much as it will let me without spending any money on this app. I love that there's more opportunities to read than a limited number a day. I just wish there weren't so many ads and the fact that the ads are complex with their set up. Other than that, I love this reading app.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible for readers. Never again. Free? Ha!!! Not if you value your time. scraped_reviews.content: I've gone through alot of book apps and this one isn't bag at all. Ads are needed and I get it. That being said the amount of ads you have to deal with slightly excessive. Not only that there has been several times I've shared the app to fb or Instagram and it's supposed to let you read without having to watch ads. Yet I've still had to watch ads. Also several times I've had to watch multiple ads, for close to 10 mins straight and still it won't unlock the chapter. Not cool

Most books aren't complete. Lots of books say that they are ongoing but the author never finishes for months at a time so you're left starting new books all the time but not finishing them. Frustrating. You're very lucky if you find an ongoing book that gets regular updates. Specialty subjects like the LGBT books are mostly unfinished and/or abandoned but if you find one that is complete or that actually gets updated regularly the story is usually 'decent enough' to 'good.'

Simply insane number of ads! You watch an ad, then read a 2-pg chapter, then another ad, and every second or third ad, you need to restart the app entirely. It's a good story or I'd have never gotten to chapter 20. But now it's forcing me to WAIT over another half hour between chapters, in spite of already waiting 45 minutes and watching FOUR ads. So I'm done. I can find other stories.

scraped_reviews.content: The creaters obviously make the free version as annoying to use as possible, and it isn't worth the paid version. 1. 40 second mandatory video every chapter (2-4 pages). 2. pop-ups between almost every page, some for a minimum of 5 seconds. 3. Flipping to the next page often skips a page when there is a short in chapter ad. & then you CANNOT go back to the page it skipped without watching that ad 3x, if you can go back at all. And the greatest offense of all: mandatory wait times. No thanks.

I really love the book I'm reading. it's has a lot of grammatical errors but it's still a nice book. I wish I didn't keep getting told that I am locked out and have to wait until the timer runs out, it's always different times, sometimes hours sometimes minutes. watching ads per chapter would be easier and less frustrating.

I have been on this app for a while, and every store I read are unfinished when they say they are complete. Very deceiving. To many adds, was thinking of purchasing to remove adds, what's the use when most books are unfinished, it seems there using someone else's book and hard work and just adding there names to it. What identifies as a good author from a wannabe is their finish book.

totally free . Love that you don't have to jump through the hoops like the other reader apps do wish the VIP was a little more affordable..
